1015  904F                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 904F 06 09        ScaleXX16Matrix197:     ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   2+ 9051 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   3+ 9053 21 3D C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   4+ 9056 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   5+ 9057 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
   6+ 9058 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
   7+ 9059 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
   8+ 905A 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
   9+ 905B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  10+ 905D DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  11+ 905F                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  11+ 905F CB 23       >			   sla e
  11+ 9061 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  12+ 9063 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  13+ 9064 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  14+ 9065 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  15+ 9066 CD BA A9                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  16+ 9069 E1                                   pop		hl
  17+ 906A 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  18+ 906B 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  19+ 906C 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  20+ 906D                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  21+ 906D                                  ;    and     $80
  22+ 906D DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  23+ 906F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  24+ 9070 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  25+ 9071 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  26+ 9072 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  27+ 9074 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9075
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
1016  9075
1017  9075                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 9075              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 9075              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 9075              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 9075              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 9075
   6+ 9075              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 9075              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 9075
   9+ 9075 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 9076 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  11+ 9079 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 907A F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 907C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 907D E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 907F 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 9080 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 9081 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 9082 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  19+ 9085 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 9086 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 9087 E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 9089 B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 908A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 908B 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 908C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 908D CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  27+ 9090 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 9091 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 9093 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 9094 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 9095 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 9097 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 9098 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 9099 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  35+ 909C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 909D 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 909E E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 90A0 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 90A1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 90A2 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 90A3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 90A4 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  43+ 90A7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 90A8 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 90AA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 90AB 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 90AC F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 90AE E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 90B0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 90B1 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 90B2 C9                                   ret
  52+ 90B3
  53+ 90B3 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 90B4 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  55+ 90B7 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 90B9 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 90BB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 90BC E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 90BE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 90BF E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 90C1 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 90C2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 90C3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 90C4 CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  65+ 90C7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 90C8 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 90C9 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 90CB B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 90CC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 90CD 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 90CE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 90CF CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  73+ 90D2 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 90D4 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 90D6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 90D7 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 90D9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 90DA 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 90DB E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 90DD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 90DE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 90DF CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  83+ 90E2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 90E3 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 90E4 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 90E6 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 90E7 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 90E8 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 90E9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 90EA CD 38 9C                             call    doRND
  91+ 90ED EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 90EE F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 90F0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 90F1 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 90F2 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 90F4 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 90F6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 90F7 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 90F8 C9                                   ret
 100+ 90F9
 101+ 90F9              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 90F9 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 90FA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 90FC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 90FD AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 90FE                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 90FE FA 2C 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 9101 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 9102 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 9103                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 9103 FA 0D 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 9106 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 9107 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 9109                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 9109 FA 20 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 910C C9                                   ret
 114+ 910D 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 910E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 9110 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 9111 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 9112 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 9114 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 9115 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 9116 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 9118                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 9118 FA 20 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 911B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 911C F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 911E 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 911F C9                                   ret
 127+ 9120              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 9120 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 9121 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 9122 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 9123 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 9124 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 9125 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 9126 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9127 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9129 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 912A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 912B C9                                   ret
 133+ 912C B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 912D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 912E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 9130 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 9131 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 9132 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 9134 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 9135 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 9136 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9137 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9138 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9139 C9                                   ret
 145+ 913A
 146+ 913A 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 913B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 913D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 913E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 913F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 913F FA 57 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 9142 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 9143 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9144                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9144 FA 49 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9147 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9148 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9149 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 914A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 914C 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 914D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 914E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 9150 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 9151 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 9152 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9154 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9155 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9156 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9157 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9158 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 915A 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 915B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 915C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 915E 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 915F B7                                   or      a
 174+ 9160 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 9162 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9164 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9165 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9166 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9167 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9168              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9168 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9169 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 916A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 916B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 916C 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 916D 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 916E 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 916F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 9171 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 9172 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 9173 C9                                   ret
 186+ 9174              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 9174 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 9176 78                                   ld      a,b
 189+ 9177 32 D0 98                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 190+ 917A 21 1D 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 191+ 917D CD 75 90     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 192+ 9180 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 193+ 9182 C9                                   ret
 194+ 9183              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 195+ 9183 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 196+ 9185 78                                   ld      a,b
 197+ 9186 32 D0 98                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 198+ 9189 21 1D 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 199+ 918C CD B3 90     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 200+ 918F 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 201+ 9191 C9                                   ret
 202+ 9192              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 203+ 9192              DustForward:            ; break
 204+ 9192 3A D0 98                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 205+ 9195 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 206+ 9196 FD 21 1D 9A                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 207+ 919A C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 208+ 919B FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 209+ 919E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 210+ 919F 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 211+ 91A1 3A D3 97                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 212+ 91A4 FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ 91A6 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 214+ 91A8 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 215+ 91A9 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 216+ 91AA 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 217+ 91AC CD 2E AA                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 218+ 91AF                                      ShiftHLRight1
 218+ 91AF CB 3C       >			   srl h
 218+ 91B1 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 219+ 91B3                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 219+ 91B3 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 219+ 91B5 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 220+ 91B7 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 221+ 91B8 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 222+ 91BA DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 223+ 91BC FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 223+ 91C0 66 05
 224+ 91C2 ED 5B D4 97                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 225+ 91C6 CD F9 90                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 226+ 91C9                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 226+ 91C9 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 226+ 91CB C2 20 93    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 227+ 91CE FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 227+ 91D2 74 05
 228+ 91D4 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 228+ 91D8 66 01
 229+ 91DA 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 230+ 91DB E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 231+ 91DD 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 232+ 91DE DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 233+ 91E0 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 234+ 91E2 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 235+ 91E3 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 236+ 91E5 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 237+ 91E6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 238+ 91E7 CD 3A 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 239+ 91EA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 91EB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 241+ 91ED                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 241+ 91ED FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 241+ 91EF D2 20 93    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 242+ 91F2 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 242+ 91F6 74 01
 243+ 91F8 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 243+ 91FC 66 03
 244+ 91FE 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 245+ 91FF E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 246+ 9201 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 247+ 9202 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 248+ 9204 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 249+ 9206 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 250+ 9207 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 251+ 9209 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 252+ 920A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 253+ 920B CD 3A 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 254+ 920E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255+ 920F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 256+ 9211                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 256+ 9211 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 256+ 9213 D2 20 93    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 257+ 9216 7C                                   ld      a,h
 258+ 9217 E6 80                                and     $80
 259+ 9219 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 260+ 921B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 261+ 921C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 261+ 921C FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 261+ 921E D2 20 93    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 262+ 9221 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 262+ 9225 74 03
 263+ 9227              ; Now roll
 264+ 9227              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 265+ 9227 2A EE 96     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 266+ 922A 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267+ 922B FE 00                                cp      0
 268+ 922D 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 269+ 922F                                      ;break
 270+ 922F                                      ;ld      a,$80
 271+ 922F                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 272+ 922F E5                                   push    hl
 273+ 9230 7C                                   ld      a,h
 274+ 9231 E6 80                                and     $80
 275+ 9233 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 276+ 9234 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 277+ 9235 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 278+ 9238 5F                                   ld      e,a
 279+ 9239 E6 80                                and     $80
 280+ 923B 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 281+ 923C 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 282+ 923D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 923F 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 284+ 9240 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 285+ 9242 79                                   ld      a,c
 286+ 9243 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 287+ 9244 B2                                   or      d
 288+ 9245 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 289+ 9246 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 289+ 924A 66 01
 290+ 924C CD F9 90                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 291+ 924F FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 291+ 9253 74 01
 292+ 9255              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 293+ 9255              .YRoll:                 ;break
 294+ 9255 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 295+ 9256 7C                                   ld      a,h
 296+ 9257 E6 80                                and     $80
 297+ 9259 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 298+ 925A 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 299+ 925B FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 300+ 925E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 301+ 925F E6 80                                and     $80
 302+ 9261 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 303+ 9262 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 304+ 9263 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 305+ 9265 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 306+ 9266 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 307+ 9268 79                                   ld      a,c
 308+ 9269 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 309+ 926A B2                                   or      d
 310+ 926B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 311+ 926C FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 311+ 9270 66 03
 312+ 9272 CD 3A 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 313+ 9275 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 313+ 9279 74 03
 314+ 927B 3A DE 96     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 315+ 927E FE 00                                cp      0
 316+ 9280 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 317+ 9282              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 318+ 9282 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 319+ 9283 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 320+ 9286 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 321+ 9287 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 322+ 9289 5F                                   ld      e,a
 323+ 928A ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 324+ 928C                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 324+ 928C CB 23       >			   sla e
 324+ 928E CB 12       >			   rl  d
 325+ 9290 3A E0 96                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 326+ 9293 B2                                   or      d
 327+ 9294 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 328+ 9295 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 328+ 9299 66 03
 329+ 929B CD 3A 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 330+ 929E FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 330+ 92A2 74 03
 331+ 92A4              ; now work out screen pos
 332+ 92A4              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 333+ 92A4              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 334+ 92A4              ;        pop     de
 335+ 92A4               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 336+ 92A4                                      ;pop     de
 337+ 92A4              .NoPitch:
 338+ 92A4 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 339+ 92A7 6F                                   ld      l,a
 340+ 92A8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 341+ 92AA                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 341+ 92AA CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 341+ 92AC C2 B5 92    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 342+ 92AF C6 80                                add     a,$80
 343+ 92B1 4F                                   ld      c,a
 344+ 92B2 C3 BA 92                             jp      StarDoneX
 345+ 92B5 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 346+ 92B6 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 347+ 92B8 90                                   sub     b
 348+ 92B9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 349+ 92BA FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 350+ 92BD 6F                                   ld      l,a
 351+ 92BE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 352+ 92C0                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 352+ 92C0 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 352+ 92C2 C2 CB 92    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 353+ 92C5 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 354+ 92C7 47                                   ld      b,a
 355+ 92C8 C3 D0 92                             jp      StarDoneY
 356+ 92CB 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 357+ 92CC 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 358+ 92CE 90                                   sub     b
 359+ 92CF 47                                   ld      b,a
 360+ 92D0 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 361+ 92D2 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 92D3              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 92D3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 92D7 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 92DA FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 92DD C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 92DE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 92DE FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 366+ 92E0 D2 10 93    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 92E3 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 92E5 0C                                   inc     c
 369+ 92E6 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 92E7                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 92E7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 371+ 92EB CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 372+ 92EE FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 373+ 92F1 C1                                   pop    bc
 374+ 92F2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 374+ 92F2 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 374+ 92F4 D2 10 93    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 375+ 92F7 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 376+ 92F9 04                                   inc     b
 377+ 92FA C5                                   push    bc
 378+ 92FB                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 378+ 92FB ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 379+ 92FF CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 380+ 9302 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 381+ 9305 C1                                   pop    bc
 382+ 9306 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 383+ 9308 0D                                   dec     c
 384+ 9309                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 384+ 9309 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 385+ 930D CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 386+ 9310 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 387+ 9311 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 388+ 9313 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 389+ 9314 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 390+ 9318 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 391+ 9319 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 392+ 931B 05                                   dec     b
 393+ 931C C2 9A 91                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 394+ 931F C9                                   ret
 395+ 9320              ResetStar:              ;break
 396+ 9320                                      ;pop     de
 397+ 9320 C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 398+ 9321 3A D0 98                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 399+ 9324 90                                   sub     b
 400+ 9325 57                                   ld      d,a
 401+ 9326 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 402+ 9328 ED 30                                mul
 403+ 932A 21 1D 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 404+ 932D 19                                   add     hl,de
 405+ 932E CD 75 90                             call    InitStarAtHL
 406+ 9331 C3 18 93                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 407+ 9334              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ 9334 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 409+ 9337 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 410+ 933A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 411+ 933B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 412+ 933D 47                                   ld      b,a
 413+ 933E CD D1 A9                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 414+ 9341 7D                                   ld      a,l
 415+ 9342                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 415+ 9342 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 415+ 9344 C2 4F 93    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 416+ 9347              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 417+ 9347 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 418+ 9349 26 00                                ld          h,0
 419+ 934B 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 420+ 934C C3 56 93                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 421+ 934F              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 422+ 934F 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 423+ 9351 26 00                                ld          h,0
 424+ 9353                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 9353 B7          >                        or a
 425+ 9354 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 426+ 9356              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 427+ 9356 7D                                   ld          a,l
 428+ 9357 32 75 9A                             ld          (varStarX),a
 429+ 935A C9                                   ret
 430+ 935B
 431+ 935B FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 432+ 935E FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 433+ 9361 6F                                   ld          l,a
 434+ 9362 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 435+ 9364 47                                   ld          b,a
 436+ 9365 CD D1 A9                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 437+ 9368 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 438+ 9369                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 438+ 9369 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 438+ 936B C2 76 93    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 439+ 936E                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 440+ 936E 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 441+ 9370                                      ClearCarryFlag
 441+ 9370 B7          >                        or a
 442+ 9371 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 443+ 9373 C3 7B 93                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 444+ 9376              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 445+ 9376 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 446+ 9378 26 00                                ld          h,0
 447+ 937A 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 448+ 937B              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 449+ 937B 7D                                   ld          a,l
 450+ 937C 32 76 9A                             ld          (varStarY),a
 451+ 937F C9                                   ret
 452+ 9380
 453+ 9380
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

1019  9380              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_object.asm"
1020  9380              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_ship_point.asm"

1023  9380                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 9380
   2+ 9380 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9381 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9385 7D
   4+ 9386 80 93        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9388 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 938A 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 938D 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 938F 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9393              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9393
  11+ 9393              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9393              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9393              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9393 32 80 93     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9396              .set_target:
  16+ 9396 22 8D 93     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 9399              .set_length:
  18+ 9399 ED 53 88 93  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 939D              .write_dma:
  20+ 939D 21 81 93     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 93A0 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 93A2 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 93A4 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 93A6 C9           	ret
  25+ 93A7
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1024  93A7                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 93A7
   2+ 93A7 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 93AB 7D
   3+ 93AC 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 93AE 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 93B0 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 93B3 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 93B5 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 93B9              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 93B9
  10+ 93B9              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 93B9              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 93B9              .set_target:
  13+ 93B9 22 B3 93     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 93BC              .set_source:
  15+ 93BC ED 53 AC 93  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 93C0              .set_length:
  17+ 93C0 ED 43 AE 93  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 93C4              .write_dma:
  19+ 93C4 21 A7 93     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 93C7 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 93C9 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 93CB ED B3        	otir
  23+ 93CD C9           	ret

   3+ 93CE              ; $FDFE;65022 G, F, D, S, A                 9  8  7  6  5

  40+ 93CE              ;              Launch                    Distance       Hyperspace  Laser                               DockComp    BuyCargo
  41+ 93CE              ;              ResumeGame

  44+ 93CE

  46+ 93CE              c_Pressed_Aft           equ 1  * 2

 161+ 93CE              KeyCode_Equip        	equ VK_C
 162+ 93CE              KeyCode_GalacticChrt 	equ VK_5
 163+ 93CE              KeyCode_LocalChart   	equ VK_6
 164+ 93CE              KeyCode_MarketPrices 	equ VK_7
 165+ 93CE              KeyCode_Status       	equ VK_8
 166+ 93CE              KeyCode_Inventory    	equ VK_9
 167+ 93CE              KeyCode_GameSkip     	equ VK_Z
 168+ 93CE              KeyCode_Save         	equ VK_O
 169+ 93CE              KeyCode_Freeze       	equ VK_B
 170+ 93CE              KeyCode_Resume       	equ VK_L
 171+ 93CE              KeyCode_Recentre     	equ VK_D
 172+ 93CE              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 173+ 93CE              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 174+ 93CE              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 175+ 93CE              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 176+ 93CE
 177+ 93CE 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40
 178+ 93F6              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 93F6 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 93FE FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 9402 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 9406 FE EF FE DF
 180+ 940A FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 940E              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 940E              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 940E              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 940E DD 93 DE 93  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 9412 DF 93 E0 93
 184+ 9416 E8 93
 185+ 9418 E7 93 D8 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 941C D3 93 D9 93
 185+ 9420 D4 93
 186+ 9422 F1 93 DC 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 186+ 9426 D6 93 DB 93
 186+ 942A DA 93
 187+ 942C EA 93 CE 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 187+ 9430 F4 93 F0 93
 187+ 9434 EF 93
 188+ 9436 D7 93 ED 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 188+ 943A F5 93 D2 93
 188+ 943E D1 93
 189+ 9440 E1 93 E6 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 189+ 9444 E5 93 E4 93
 189+ 9448 E3 93
 190+ 944A CF 93 E8 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 190+ 944E F5 93 ED 93
 190+ 9452 D5 93
 191+ 9454 EB 93 E2 93                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 191+ 9458 D8 93 D3 93
 191+ 945C D6 93
 192+ 945E
 193+ 945E 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 193+ 9462 56
 194+ 9463 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 194+ 9467 47
 195+ 9468 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 195+ 946C 54
 196+ 946D 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 196+ 9471 35
 197+ 9472 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 197+ 9476 36
 198+ 9477 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 198+ 947B 59
 199+ 947C 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 199+ 9480 48
 200+ 9481 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 200+ 9485 42
 201+ 9486
 202+ 9486
 203+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 204+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 205+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 206+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 207+ 9486              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 208+ 9486              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 209+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 210+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 211+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 212+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 213+ 9486              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 214+ 9486              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 215+ 9486              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 216+ 9486              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 217+ 9486              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 218+ 9486              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb

 220+ 9486              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 221+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 222+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance

 224+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 9486              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 9486              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 9486              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 9486              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 9486              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 9486              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 237+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 238+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 239+ 9486              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 240+ 9486              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 241+ 9486              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 242+ 9486              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 9486
 244+ 9486
 245+ 9486              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 9486 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 9486 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 9486 ~                                JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 249+ 9486                                  ENDM
 250+ 9486
 251+ 9486 21 CE 93     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 9489 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 948C 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 948E CD 93 93                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 9491 C9                               ret
 256+ 9492
 257+ 9492 21 F6 93     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 9495 11 FE 93                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 9498 AF                               xor		a
 260+ 9499 FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 949C DD 21 CE 93                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 94A0 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 94A1 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 94A2 13                               inc		de
 265+ 94A3 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 94A4 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 94A5 13                               inc		de
 268+ 94A6 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 94A8 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 94A9 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 94AA 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 94AC CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 94AE 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 94B0 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 94B1 AF                               xor     a
 276+ 94B2 C3 BE 94                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 94B5 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 94B7 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 94B8 DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 94BB 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 94BC E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 94BE DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 94C1 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 94C2 DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 94C4 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 94C6 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 94C8 FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 94CA 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 94CC C9                               ret
 290+ 94CD
 291+ 94CD              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 94CD ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 94CD ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 94CD ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 94CD ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 94CD ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 94CD ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 94CD ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 94CD                                    ENDM
 300+ 94CD
 301+ 94CD
 302+ 94CD              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 94CD              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 94CD 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 94D0 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 94D2 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 94D3 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 94D4 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 94D5 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 94D6 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 94D7 D5                                       push    de
 305+ 94D8 CD 92 94     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 94DB E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 94DC E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 94DD 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 94DE                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 94DE FE 01       >                        cp     1
 309+ 94E0 C2 D8 94    >                        jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 94E3 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 94E4 C9                                       ret
 312+ 94E5
 313+ 94E5              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 94E5 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 94E8 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 94EA 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 94EB 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 94EC 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 94ED 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 94EE 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 94EF D5                                       push    de
 315+ 94F0 CD 92 94     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 94F3 E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 94F4 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 94F5 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 94F6                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 94F6 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 94F8 DA F0 94    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 94FB E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 94FC C9                                       ret
 322+ 94FD
 323+ 94FD              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 94FD 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 9500 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 9502 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 9503 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 9504 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 9505 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 9506 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 9507 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 9508 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 9509 C9                                       ret
 327+ 950A
 328+ 950A              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 950A 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 950D ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 950F 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 9510 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 9511 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 9512 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 9513 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 9514 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 9515 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 9517 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 9518 C9                                       ret
 333+ 9519
 334+ 9519              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 9519              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 9519 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 951C ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 951E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 951F 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 9520 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 9521 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9522 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 9523 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 9524 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 9525 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 9527 C9                                       ret
 340+ 9528
 341+ 9528              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 9528              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 9528 21 0E 94    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 952B ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 952D 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 952E 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 952F 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 9530 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9531 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9532 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 9533 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 9534 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 9536 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 9538 C9                                       ret
 348+ 9539
 349+ 9539              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 9539 21 CE 93         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 953C 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 953E 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 9540              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 9540 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 9541 FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 9543 CA 4D 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 9546 23               inc     hl
 358+ 9547 0C               inc     c
 359+ 9548 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 954A                  SetAFalse
 360+ 954A 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 361+ 954C C9               ret
 362+ 954D              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 954D 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 954E C9               ret
 365+ 954F
 366+ 954F              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 954F 21 CE 93         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 9552 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 9554 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 9556              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 9556 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 9557 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 9559 FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 955B CA 65 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 955E 23               inc     hl
 376+ 955F 0C               inc     c
 377+ 9560 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 9562                  SetAFalse
 378+ 9562 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 379+ 9564 C9               ret
 380+ 9565              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 9565 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 9566 C9               ret
 383+ 9567
 384+ 9567
 385+ 9567 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 9585 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 9586 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 9587 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 9588 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 9589              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 9589
 392+ 9589              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 9589 21 67 95         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 958C 3A 86 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 958F FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 9591 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 9593 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 9594 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 9596 ED B0            ldir
 400+ 9598              .NoString
 401+ 9598 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 959A 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 959B C9               ret
 404+ 959C
 405+ 959C              initInputText:
 406+ 959C AF               xor     a
 407+ 959D 32 86 95         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 95A0 32 87 95         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 95A3 32 88 95         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 95A6 21 67 95         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 95A9 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 95AB              .wipeloop:
 413+ 95AB 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 95AC 23               inc     hl
 415+ 95AD 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 95AF C9               ret
 417+ 95B0
 418+ 95B0 AF           InputName:              xor     a
 419+ 95B1 32 88 95                             ld      (InputChanged),a
 420+ 95B4 CD 39 95                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 421+ 95B7 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 422+ 95B9 C8                                   ret     z
 423+ 95BA 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 424+ 95BB 3A 86 95                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 425+ 95BE FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 426+ 95C0 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 427+ 95C2 21 5E 94                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 428+ 95C5 79                                   ld      a,c
 429+ 95C6 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 430+ 95C8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 431+ 95C9 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 432+ 95CB 30 15                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 433+ 95CD              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 434+ 95CD FE 30        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 435+ 95CF 28 3B                                jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 436+ 95D1 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 437+ 95D3 28 24                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 438+ 95D5 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 439+ 95D7 28 33                                jr      z,.CapsPressed
 440+ 95D9 FE 5E                                cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 441+ 95DB 28 2F                                jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 442+ 95DD FE 20                                cp      " "         ; space
 443+ 95DF 28 2B                                jr      z,.SpacePressed
 444+ 95E1 C9                                   ret
 445+ 95E2 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 446+ 95E3 3A 86 95                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 447+ 95E6 4F                                   ld      c,a
 448+ 95E7 21 67 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 449+ 95EA ED 31                                add     hl,a
 450+ 95EC 78                                   ld      a,b
 451+ 95ED 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 452+ 95EE 79                                   ld      a,c
 453+ 95EF 21 86 95                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 454+ 95F2 34                                   inc     (hl)
 455+ 95F3                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 455+ 95F3 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 95F5 32 88 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 456+ 95F8 C9                                   ret
 457+ 95F9 3A 86 95     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 458+ 95FC 3C                                   inc     a
 459+ 95FD 21 67 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 460+ 9600 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 461+ 9602 AF                                   xor     a
 462+ 9603 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 463+ 9604 3D                                   dec     a
 464+ 9605 32 87 95                             ld      (EnterPressed),a
 465+ 9608 32 88 95                             ld      (InputChanged),a
 466+ 960B C9                                   ret
 467+ 960C              .CheckShiftDelete:
 468+ 960C              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 469+ 960C              .SymbolPressed:
 470+ 960C 3A 86 95     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 471+ 960F FE 00                                cp      0
 472+ 9611 C8                                   ret     z
 473+ 9612 3D                                   dec     a
 474+ 9613 32 86 95                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 475+ 9616 21 67 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 476+ 9619 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 477+ 961B AF                                   xor     a
 478+ 961C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 479+ 961D                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 479+ 961D 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 479+ 961F 32 88 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 480+ 9622 C9                                   ret
 481+ 9623
 482+ 9623 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 483+ 9624 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 484+ 9627 3A E3 97                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 485+ 962A E6 FC                                and     $FC
 486+ 962C 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 487+ 962E 2A 1C 94     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 488+ 9631 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 489+ 9632                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 489+ 9632 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 489+ 9633 CA 41 96    >                        jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 490+ 9636 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 491+ 9639 F6 80                                or      $80
 492+ 963B 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 493+ 963E C3 77 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 494+ 9641 2A 1A 94     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 495+ 9644 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 496+ 9645                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 496+ 9645 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 496+ 9646 CA 77 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 497+ 9649 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 498+ 964C F6 40                                or      $40
 499+ 964E 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 500+ 9651 C3 77 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 501+ 9654 2A 58 94     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 502+ 9657 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 503+ 9658                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 503+ 9658 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 503+ 9659 CA 67 96    >                        jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 504+ 965C 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 505+ 965F F6 80                                or      $80
 506+ 9661 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 507+ 9664 C3 77 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 508+ 9667 2A 5A 94     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 509+ 966A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 510+ 966B                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 510+ 966B A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 510+ 966C CA 77 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 511+ 966F 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 512+ 9672 F6 40                                or      $40
 513+ 9674 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 514+ 9677 2A 16 94     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 515+ 967A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 516+ 967B                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 516+ 967B A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 516+ 967C CA 88 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRightKey
 517+ 967F 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 518+ 9682 F6 20                                or      $20
 519+ 9684 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 520+ 9687 C9                                   ret
 521+ 9688 2A 18 94     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 522+ 968B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 968C                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 523+ 968C A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 523+ 968D CA 99 96    >                        jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 524+ 9690 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 9693 F6 10                                or      $10
 526+ 9695 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 9698 C9                                   ret
 528+ 9699 2A 36 94     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 529+ 969C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 530+ 969D                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 530+ 969D A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 530+ 969E CA AA 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 531+ 96A1 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 532+ 96A4 F6 08                                or      $08
 533+ 96A6 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 534+ 96A9 C9                                   ret
 535+ 96AA 2A 52 94     ScanRecentreKey:        ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 536+ 96AD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 537+ 96AE                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 537+ 96AE A7          >                        and     a
 537+ 96AF C8          >                        ret     z
 538+ 96B0 3A E1 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 539+ 96B3 F6 04                                or      $04
 540+ 96B5 32 E1 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 541+ 96B8 C9                                   ret
 542+ 96B9
 543+ 96B9
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm

 216+ 983C 00 00 00...  DampingKeys				DS  7				; 0387 - 038D
 217+ 9843              ;  #&6 Does K toggle keyboard/joystick control -  03CD certainly makes keyboard not work anymore.
 218+ 9843              ;  #&5 Does J reverse both joystick channels
 219+ 9843              ;  #&4 Does Y reverse joystick Y channel			03CB
 220+ 9843              ;  #&2 Does X toggle startup message display ? PATG?	03C9
 221+ 9843              ;  #&3 Does F toggle flashing information			03CA
 222+ 9843              ;  #&1 Does A toggle keyboard auto-recentering ?
 223+ 9843              ;  #&0 Caps-lock toggles keyboard flight damping

   1+ 9B69 AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   2+ 9B6A 21 A8 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

   4+ 9B6F 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9B70 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 9B71 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 9B73 C9                                   ret
   8+ 9B74

  47+ 9B91 21 A8 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  48+ 9B94 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize

  50+ 9B97 BA                                   cp      d
  51+ 9B98 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  52+ 9B9A 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  53+ 9B9C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  54+ 9B9D 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  55+ 9B9E 10 F6                                djnz    .fillLoop
  56+ 9BA0 C9                                   ret

  86+ 9BC7 FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
  86+ 9BC9 CA D2 9B    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot

  89+ 9BCE 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
  90+ 9BD0                                      SetCarryFlag
  90+ 9BD0 37          >                        scf
  91+ 9BD1 C9                                   ret

  93+ 9BD3 C9                                   ret

   6+ 9BE1 19           Fuel					DB	25				; 0365  QQ14
   7+ 9BE2 05 02 03 01  LaserList				DB	5,2,3,1			; View Lasers $0368 to $036B
   8+ 9BE6 46           CargoBaySize			DB	70				; 036E
   9+ 9BE7 00           CargoRunningLoad        DB  0

  19+ 9C00 00 00 00 00  LaserPulsePause         DS  4               ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
  20+ 9C04 00 00 00 00  LaserPulseDuration      DS  4               ; time laser is on per shot
  21+ 9C08 00 00 00 00  LaserDamageOutput       DS  4               ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  22+ 9C0C 00 00 00 00  LaserEnergyDrain        DS  4               ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  23+ 9C10 00 00 00 00  LaserHeat               DS  4               ; amount of heat generated
  24+ 9C14 00 00 00 00  LaserDurability         DS  4               ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
  25+ 9C18 00 00 00 00  LaserDurabilityAmount   DS  4               ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
  26+ 9C1C
