1034  9C37                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9C37              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9C37              doRND2:
   3+ 9C37 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9C38              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9C38              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9C38 3A C9 96     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9C3B CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9C3D 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9C3E 21 CB 96     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9C41 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9C42 32 C9 96     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9C45 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9C46 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9C47 32 CB 96                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9C4A 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9C4B 3A CA 96                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9C4E 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9C4F 21 CC 96     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9C52 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9C53 32 CA 96                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9C56 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9C57 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9C58 32 CC 96                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9C5B 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9C5C C9                                   ret
  26+ 9C5D
  27+ 9C5D              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9C5D 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9C5F 21 0D C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9C62              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9C62              EE55:
  32+ 9C62 CD 38 9C     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9C65 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9C66 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9C67 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9C69 C9               ret
  37+ 9C6A
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 9C6A 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9C6E 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9C72 45 44
   2+ 9C74 21 C4 98     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9C77 11 C3 97                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9C7A ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 9C7C ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 9C7E ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9C80 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9C82 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9C84 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9C86 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9C87
  12+ 9C87 21 C3 97     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9C8A 11 C4 98                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9C8D 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9C8F
  16+ 9C8F 21 C4 98     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9C92 11 B8 98                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9C95 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9C97
  20+ 9C97 21 B8 98     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9C9A 11 C4 98                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9C9D 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9C9F
  24+ 9C9F 21 B8 98     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9CA2 11 C3 97                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9CA5 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9CA7
  28+ 9CA7 21 C3 97     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9CAA 11 B8 98                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9CAD 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9CAF
  32+ 9CAF              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9CAF CD B2 9C     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9CB2              .NextStep:
  35+ 9CB2 CD B5 9C     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9CB5              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9CB5 3A C3 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9CB8 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9CB9 21 C5 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9CBC 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9CBD 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9CBE 3A C4 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9CC1 21 C6 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9CC4 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9CC5 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9CC6 3A C5 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9CC9 32 C3 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9CCC 3A C6 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9CCF 32 C4 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9CD2 3A C8 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9CD5 32 C6 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9CD8 3A C7 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9CDB 32 C5 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9CDE B7           		or		a
  55+ 9CDF 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9CE0 21 C5 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9CE3 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9CE4 32 C7 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9CE7 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9CE8 21 C6 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9CEB 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9CEC 32 C8 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9CEF C9           		ret
  64+ 9CF0
  65+ 9CF0              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9CF0 CD F3 9C     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9CF3              .NextStep:
  68+ 9CF3 CD F6 9C     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9CF6              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9CF6              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9CF6 3A B8 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9CF9 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9CFA 21 BA 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9CFD 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9CFE 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9CFF              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9CFF 3A B9 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9D02 21 BB 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9D05 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9D06 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9D07 3A BA 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9D0A 32 B8 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9D0D 3A BB 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9D10 32 B9 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 9D13 3A BD 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9D16 32 BB 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9D19 3A BC 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9D1C 32 BA 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9D1F B7           		or		a
  90+ 9D20 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 9D21 21 BA 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9D24 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9D25 32 BC 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9D28 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9D29 21 BB 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9D2C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9D2D 32 BD 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9D30 C9           		ret
  99+ 9D31
 100+ 9D31 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9D32 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9D33 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9D34
 104+ 9D34 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9D35 32 DC 97                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9D38 3A C4 97     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 9D3B 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 9D3C 3A CB 98     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 9D3F 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 9D40 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 9D41 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 9D42 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 9D44 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 9D46 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 9D48 32 33 9D     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 9D4B ED 5B 31 9D                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 9D4F BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 9D50 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 9D52 3A C6 97     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 9D55 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 9D56 3A CA 98                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 9D59 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 9D5A 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 9D5B 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 9D5C CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 9D5E 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 9D60 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 9D62 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 9D63 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 9D64 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 9D66 3A 33 9D     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 9D69 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 9D6A ED 43 31 9D                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 9D6E C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 9D6F CD A7 9C                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 9D72 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 9D73 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 9D74 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 9D75 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 9D76 CD AF 9C     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 9D79 3A DC 97                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 9D7C 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 9D7D FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 9D7F C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 9D80 32 DC 97                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 9D83 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 9D85
 148+ 9D85              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 9D85 3A B9 98     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 9D88 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 9D8A 32 62 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 9D8D 3A BA 98     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 9D90 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 9D92 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 9D94 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 9D96 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 9D98 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 9D9A 32 63 98     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 9D9D CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 9D9F FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 9DA1 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 9DA3              .Fedual:
 163+ 9DA3 3A 62 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 9DA6 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 9DA8 32 62 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 9DAB              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 9DAB 3A 62 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 9DAE EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 9DB0 32 64 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 9DB3 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 9DB4 3A BB 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 9DB7 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 9DB9 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 9DBA 32 64 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 9DBD 3A 63 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 9DC0 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 9DC2 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 9DC3 3A 64 98     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 9DC6 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 9DC7 32 64 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 9DCA CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 9DCC CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 9DCE 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 9DCF 3A 62 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 9DD2 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 9DD3 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 9DD4 3A 63 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 9DD7 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 9DD8 32 65 98     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 9DDB 3A 62 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 9DDE EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 9DE0 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 9DE2 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 9DE3 3A 63 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 9DE6 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 9DE8 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 9DE9 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 9DEB 3A 65 98     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 9DEE 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 9DEF ED 30        		mul
 201+ 9DF1 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 9DF3 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 9DF5 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 9DF7 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 9DF9 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 9DFB CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 9DFD ED 53 67 98  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 9E01              .DoRadius:
 209+ 9E01 3A BB 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 9E04 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 9E05 3A BD 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 9E08 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 9E0A C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 9E0C 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 9E0D ED 43 6B 98  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 9E11 C9           		ret

  20+ 9EB7 00 00 08 00  RankingTable		DW	$0000,$0008,$0010,$0020,$0040,$0080,$0200,$0A00,$1900,$4900,$FFFF

  34+ 9F42 CD 9E D6 9E  RankingNameIdx		dw RankingName1,RankingName2,RankingName3,RankingName4,RankingName5,RankingName6,RankingName7,RankingName8,RankingName9,RankingName10,RankingName11
  34+ 9F46 E6 9E EB 9E
  34+ 9F4A F3 9E 01 9F
  34+ 9F4E 0B 9F 15 9F
  34+ 9F52 1C 9F 2F 9F
  34+ 9F56 3B 9F
  35+ 9F58              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  36+ 9F58
  37+ 9F58
  38+ 9F58              getTableText:
  39+ 9F58              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9F58              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9F58 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9F59 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9F5B ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9F5D 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9F5E 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9F5F 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9F60 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9F61 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9F62 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9F63
  51+ 9F63
  52+ 9F63              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9F63              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9F63              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9F63              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9F63              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9F63              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9F63              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9F63              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9F63              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9F63 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9F64 B3           	or		e
  63+ 9F65 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9F67 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9F68 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9F69 21 B7 9E     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9F6C              .testLoop:
  68+ 9F6C 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9F6D 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9F6E 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9F6F E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9F70 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9F71 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9F72 CD 72 AB     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9F75 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9F77              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9F77 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9F78 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9F79 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9F7A 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9F7B 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9F7D              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9F7D E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9F7E C9           	ret
  85+ 9F7F
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 178+ A400              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2

 180+ A400
 181+ A400              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A400              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A400              .CapLoop:
 184+ A400 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A401 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A402 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A404 C8           	ret		z
 188+ A405 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A407 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A409 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A40B 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A40D              .LowerCase:
 193+ A40D C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A40F 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A410 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A412
 197+ A412              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A412 21 83 A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A415 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A417 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A419 D5           	push	de
 202+ A41A 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A41B 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A41C 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A41D EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A41E D1           	pop		de
 207+ A41F C9           	ret
 208+ A420
 209+ A420
 210+ A420              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A420              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A420 21 A9 A3     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A423 CD 58 9F     	call	getTableText
 214+ A426 11 DF A3     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A429              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A429 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A42A FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A42C 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A42E E5           	push	hl
 220+ A42F D5           	push	de
 221+ A430 21 83 A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A433 CD 58 9F     	call	getTableText
 223+ A436 D1           	pop		de
 224+ A437              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A437 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A438 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A43A 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A43C              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A43C 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A43D 13           	inc		de
 231+ A43E 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A43F 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A441              .AddSpace:
 234+ A441 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A443 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A444 13           	inc		de
 237+ A445 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A446 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A447 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A449              .ReadDone:
 241+ A449 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A44A AF           	xor		a
 243+ A44B 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A44C C9           	ret

 194+ A4E7              ;CA                      DEX

 196+ A4E7              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ A4E7              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ A4E7              ;60                      RTS
 199+ A4E7              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ A4E7              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ A4E7              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ A4E7              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ A4E7              ;60                      RTS
 204+ A4E7              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ A4E7              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ A4E7              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ A4E7              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ A4E7              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ A4E7              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ A4E7              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ A4E7              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ A4E7              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ A4E7              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ A4E7              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ A4E7              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A4E7              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A4E7              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A4E7              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A4E7              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A4E7              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A4E7              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A4E7              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A4E7              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A4E7              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A4E7              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A4E7              ;
 227+ A4E7              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A4E7              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A4E7              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A4E7              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A4E7              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A4E7              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A4E7              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A4E7              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A4E7              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A4E7              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A4E7              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A4E7              ;
 239+ A4E7              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A4E7              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A4E7              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A4E7              ;
 243+ A4E7              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A4E7              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A4E7              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A4E7              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A4E7              ;
 248+ A4E7              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A4E7              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A4E7              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A4E7              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A4E7              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A4E7              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A4E7              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A4E7              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A4E7              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A4E7              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A4E7              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A4E7              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A4E7              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A4E7              ;
 262+ A4E7              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A4E7              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A4E7              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A4E7              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A4E7              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A4E7              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A4E7              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A4E7              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A4E7              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ A4E7              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ A4E7              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ A4E7              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ A4E7              ;
 275+ A4E7              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ A4E7              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ A4E7              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ A4E7              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ A4E7              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ A4E7              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ A4E7              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ A4E7              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ A4E7              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ A4E7              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ A4E7              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ A4E7              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ A4E7              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ A4E7              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ A4E7              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ A4E7              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ A4E7              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ A4E7              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ A4E7              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ A4E7              ;C8                      INY
 295+ A4E7              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ A4E7              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ A4E7              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ A4E7              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ A4E7              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ A4E7              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ A4E7              ;98                      TYA
 302+ A4E7              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ A4E7              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ A4E7              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ A4E7              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ A4E7              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ A4E7              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ A4E7              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ A4E7              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ A4E7              ;68                      PLA
 311+ A4E7              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ A4E7              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ A4E7              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ A4E7              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ A4E7              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ A4E7              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ A4E7              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ A4E7              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27

   1+ A4E7 CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
   2+ A4E9 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
   3+ A4EB CD 88 AB                             call    negate16hl
   4+ A4EE CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
   5+ A4F0 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
   6+ A4F2 CD 8F AB                             call    negate16de
   7+ A4F5 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
   8+ A4F6 AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
   9+ A4F7 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  10+ A4F9 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early

1044  A500                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A500              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A500 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A501 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A502 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A503 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A505 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A506 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A507 ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A509 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A50A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A50C B4                                   or      h
  12+ A50D C9                                   ret
  13+ A50E              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A50E 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A50F 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A510 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A511 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A513 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A515 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A516 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A518 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A519                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A519 B7          >                        or a
  23+ A51A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A51C C9                                   ret
  25+ A51D 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A51E ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A520 C9                                   ret
  28+ A521
  29+ A521              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A521 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A522 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A523 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A525 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A527 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A528 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A52A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A52C 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A52D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A52F 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A530 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A531 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A533 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A534 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A535 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A536 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A537 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A538 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A539 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A53A 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A53B 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A53C FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A53E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A53F C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A540 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A541 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A543 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A545 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A546 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A547 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A549 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A54B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A54C E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A54D 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A54F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A551 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A552 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A554 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A556 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A557                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A557 BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A558 DA 62 A5    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A55B 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A55D              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A55D AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A55E 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A55F 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A560 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A561 C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A562              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A562 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A563 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A564 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A565 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A566 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A567 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A568 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A569 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A56A 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A56B FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A56D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A56F B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A570 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A571 C9                                   ret
  92+ A572 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A573 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A574 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A575 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A576 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A577 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A578 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A579 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A57A 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A57B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A57D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A57F B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A580 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A581 C9                                   ret
 106+ A582
 107+ A582
 108+ A582              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A582 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A583 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A584 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A585 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A587 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A589 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A58A C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A58B ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A58D D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A58E 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A58F EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A590 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A591 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A593 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A594 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A595
 125+ A595
 126+ A595
 127+ A595              ; a = value to add
 128+ A595              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A595              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A595              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A595 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A598 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A599 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A59A ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A59C 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A59D E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A59F 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A5A0 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A5A1 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A5A3              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A5A3              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A5A3              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A5A3              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A5A3 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A5A4 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A5A5 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A5A6 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A5A7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A5A8 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A5A9 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A5AA CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A5AC 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A5AE              .negativecalc:
 154+ A5AE 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A5AF E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A5B1 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A5B2 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A5B4 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A5B6 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A5B8 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A5BA EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A5BB 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A5BC E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A5BE DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A5C0 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A5C2 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A5C3 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A5C4 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A5C5 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A5C6 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A5C7 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A5C8 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A5C9 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A5CA              .nocarry:
 175+ A5CA CD 88 AB             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A5CD B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A5CE EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A5CF 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A5D0 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A5D1 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A5D2 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A5D3 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A5D4 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A5D5 C9                   ret
 185+ A5D6              .postivecalc:
 186+ A5D6 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A5D8 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A5DA 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A5DB EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A5DC DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A5DE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A5DF 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A5E0 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A5E1 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A5E2 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A5E3 C9                   ret
 197+ A5E4
 198+ A5E4              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A5E4              ;MVT1
 200+ A5E4              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A5E4              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A5E4              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A5E4              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A5E4              ;
 205+ A5E4              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A5E4              ;        b = 0
 207+ A5E4              ;        c = varS
 208+ A5E4              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A5E4              ;        retain carry
 210+ A5E4              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A5E4              ;        and 7F
 212+ A5E4              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A5E4              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A5E4              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A5E4              ;
 216+ A5E4              ;    else
 217+ A5E4              ;MV10.
 218+ A5E4              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A5E4              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A5E4
 221+ A5E4
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm

   7+ A5F1 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A5F3 22 DF 9B                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A5F6 C9                                   ret

1046  A626                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A626              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A626              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A626 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A627 E5                                   push hl
   5+ A628 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A62A 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A62C E5                                   push hl
   8+ A62D AF                                   xor a
   9+ A62E 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A62F 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A630 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A632 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A634 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A636 17                                   rla
  15+ A637 B9                                   cp c
  16+ A638 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A63A 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A63C ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A63E 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A63F 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A641 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A643 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A644 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A646 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A647 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A648 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A649 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A64B D1                                   pop de
  29+ A64C 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A64D DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A64F D1                                   pop de
  32+ A650 C9                                   ret
  33+ A651
  34+ A651 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A653 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A655 CD 26 A6                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A658 F5                                   push    af
  38+ A659 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A65B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A65D B1                                   or      c
  41+ A65E 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A65F F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A660 C9                                   ret
  44+ A661
  45+ A661
  46+ A661 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A663 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A664 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A666 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A668 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A669 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A66B 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A66C FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A66E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A670 CD 26 A6                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A673 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A675 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A677 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A678 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A67A 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A67B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A67D C9                                   ret
  63+ A67E
  64+ A67E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A67E              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A67E              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A67E              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A67E 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A67F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A681 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A683 3A D7 97                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A686 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A687 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A68A 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A68B 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A68D CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A68F 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A690 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A692 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A694 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A696 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A697 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A698 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A69A 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A69B 32 D8 97                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A69E C9                                   ret
  87+ A69F
  88+ A69F              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A69F              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A69F 32 D2 96     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A6A2                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A6A2 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A6A5 22 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A6A8 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A6AB 32 D9 97                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A6AE ED 5B D0 96  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A6B2 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A6B3 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A6B5 32 D0 96                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A6B8 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A6B9 3A D2 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A6BC 21 D9 97                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A6BF AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A6C0 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A6C2 32 F4 97                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A6C5 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A6C8 3A D2 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A6CB E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A6CD              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A6CD FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A6CF D2 DD A6    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A6D2                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A6D2 CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A6D4 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ A6D6 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ A6D8 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ A6DA C2 CD A6                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ A6DD 32 D2 96     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ A6E0 ED 53 D0 96                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ A6E4 3A D9 97                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ A6E7 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ A6E9                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ A6E9 2A D7 97                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ A6EC FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ A6EE                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ A6EE CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ A6F0 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ A6F2 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ A6F4 F2 EC A6                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ A6F7 22 D7 97     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ A6FA 32 D7 97                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ A6FD 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ A6FF 32 D8 97                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ A702 3A D2 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ A705 CD 7E A6                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ A708 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ A70A 32 EC 97                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ A70D 32 ED 97                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ A710 32 EE 97                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ A713 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ A715                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ A715 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ A717 CA 42 A7    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ A71A 3A D8 97                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ A71D ED 5B EB 97                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ A721 2A EF 97                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ A724 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ A725 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ A727 CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ A729 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ A72B CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ A72D FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ A72F 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ A731 ED 53 EB 97  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ A735 22 EF 97                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ A738 3A F4 97                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ A73B 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ A73C 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ A73D B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ A73E 32 FE 97                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ A741 C9                                   ret
 152+ A742              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ A742 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ A743 CA 5A A7    >                        jp	z, DV13
 153+ A746 3A D8 97                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ A749 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ A74B FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ A74D C2 49 A7                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ A750 32 EB 97                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ A753                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ A753 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 158+ A756 32 EE 97    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ A759 C9                                   ret
 160+ A75A              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ A75A 3A D8 97    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 160+ A75D 32 EB 97    >                        ld       (varK),a
 161+ A760                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ A760 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 161+ A763 32 EE 97    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ A766 C9                                   ret
 163+ A767
 164+ A767
 165+ A767 CD 9F A6     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ A76A 3A EE 97                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ A76D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ A76F 21 ED 97                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ A772 B6                                   or      (hl)
 170+ A773 C2 88 A7                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 171+ A776 3A EC 97                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 172+ A779 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ A77B 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig

 174+ A77D B7          >                        or a

 176+ A781 3A EE 97                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?

  21+ A7AF
  22+ A7AF              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A7AF ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A7AF ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A7AF ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A7AF ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A7AF ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A7AF ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A7AF ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A7AF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A7AF ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A7AF ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A7AF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A7AF ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A7AF ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A7AF ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A7AF ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A7AF ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A7AF                                      ENDM

  54+ A7D1 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A7D2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A7D4 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A7D5 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A7D6                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A7D6 FA EE A7    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A7D9 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A7DA B2                                   or      d
  61+ A7DB                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A7DB FA E0 A7    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A7DE 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A7DF C9                                   ret
  64+ A7E0 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A7E1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A7E3 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A7E4 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A7E5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A7E7 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A7E8 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A7E9 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A7EB B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A7EC 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A7ED C9                                   ret
  75+ A7EE 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A7EF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A7F1 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A7F2 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A7F3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A7F5 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A7F6 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A7F7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A7F9 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A7FB 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A7FC B4                                   or      h
  86+ A7FD 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A7FE C9                                   ret
  88+ A7FF              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A7FF AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A800 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A801 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A802 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A803 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A804 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A805 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A806 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A808 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A809 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A80A C9                                   ret
