  96+ A80B                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A80B                  ;
  98+ A80B                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A80B                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A80B                  ;
 101+ A80B                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A80B                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A80B                  ;
 104+ A80B                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A80B 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A80C 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A80D ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A80F EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A810 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A812
 111+ A812 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A813 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A814 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A815 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A816
 116+ A816 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A817 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A819 C9                                   ret
 119+ A81A
 120+ A81A
 121+ A81A
 122+ A81A                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A81A                 ;
 124+ A81A                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A81A                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A81A                 ;
 127+ A81A                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A81A                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A81A                 ;
 130+ A81A                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A81A
 132+ A81A
 133+ A81A
 134+ A81A 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A81B 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A81C 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A81D 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A81E E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A81F 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A820              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A820 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A822 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A823 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A825
 145+ A825 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A826 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A827 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A828
 149+ A828 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A829 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A82A ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A82C
 153+ A82C 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A82D 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A82E
 156+ A82E 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A82F 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A830 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A831 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A832
 161+ A832 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A833 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A835
 164+ A835 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A836 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A838 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A839
 168+ A839 C9                                   ret
 169+ A83A
 170+ A83A              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A83A              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A83A              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A83A              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A83A              ;         carry reset
 175+ A83A              ; maths is
 176+ A83A              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A83A              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A83A              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A83A              ;
 180+ A83A              ;
 181+ A83A              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A83A C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A83B 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A83C 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A83D 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A83E 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A83F 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A840 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A842 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A843 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A845 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A846 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A847 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A848 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A84A 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A84B 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A84C 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A84D 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A84E                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A84E AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A84F C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A850 C9                                   ret
 203+ A851
 204+ A851              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 205+ A851 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d
 206+ A852 AC                                   xor     h
 207+ A853 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 208+ A855 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 209+ A857 7C                                   ld      a,h
 210+ A858 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 211+ A85A 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; hle = abs (hle)
 212+ A85B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 213+ A85C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 214+ A85E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; now also d = abs d
 215+ A85F ED 30        .PerformMultiply:       mul                         ; de = E*A
 216+ A861 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; c = low E*A
 217+ A862 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ;
 218+ A863 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; hl = H,A
 219+ A864 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = (E*A)/256
 220+ A865 55                                   ld      d,l                 ; de = A,L
 221+ A866 ED 30                                mul                         ; de = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 222+ A868 ED 32                                add     de,a                ; .
 223+ A86A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; hl = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 224+ A86B EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; A =  E*A, de = HA
 225+ A86C ED 30                                mul
 226+ A86E ED 32                                add     de,a                ;
 227+ A870 7A                                   ld      a,d
 228+ A871 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover sign
 229+ A873 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; sign back on d
 230+ A874 C9                                   ret
 231+ A875
 232+ A875
 233+ A875              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 234+ A875              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 235+ A875              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 236+ A875              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 237+ A875              ;         carry reset
 238+ A875              ;
 239+ A875              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 240+ A875 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 241+ A876 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 242+ A877 32 75 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A87A 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A87B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A87E 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 246+ A880 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A882 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A883 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A885 32 75 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A888 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 251+ A889 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 252+ A88C 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 253+ A88E E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 254+ A890 67                                   ld      h,a
 255+ A891 3A 75 A8                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 256+ A894 EE 80                                xor     $80
 257+ A896 32 75 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 258+ A899 CD 3A A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 259+ A89C 3A 75 A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 260+ A89F ED 27 80                             test    $80
 261+ A8A2 C8                                   ret     z
 262+ A8A3 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 263+ A8A4 95                                   sub 	l
 264+ A8A5 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 265+ A8A6 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 266+ A8A7 94                                   sub 	h
 267+ A8A8 67                                   ld 		h,a
 268+ A8A9 C9                                   ret
 269+ A8AA
 270+ A8AA AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 271+ A8AB 32 75 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 272+ A8AE 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 273+ A8AF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 274+ A8B2 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 275+ A8B4 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 276+ A8B6 57                                   ld      d,a
 277+ A8B7 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 278+ A8B9 32 75 A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 279+ A8BC CD 3A A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 280+ A8BF 3A 75 A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 281+ A8C2 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 282+ A8C5 C8                                   ret     z
 283+ A8C6 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 284+ A8C7 95                                   sub 	l
 285+ A8C8 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 286+ A8C9 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 287+ A8CA 94                                   sub 	h
 288+ A8CB 67                                   ld 		h,a
 289+ A8CC C9                                   ret
 290+ A8CD
 291+ A8CD
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1048  A8CD                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A8CD              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A8CD              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A8CD
   4+ A8CD              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A8CD ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A8CD ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A8CD ~            			mul
   8+ A8CD              			ENDM
   9+ A8CD
  10+ A8CD              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A8CD ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A8CD ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A8CD ~            			mul
  14+ A8CD ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A8CD              			ENDM
  16+ A8CD
  17+ A8CD
  18+ A8CD              asm_squa:
  19+ A8CD E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A8CF              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A8CF              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A8CF              asm_squa2:
  23+ A8CF 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A8D0 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A8D1 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A8D3 ED 53 D0 96  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A8D7 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A8D8 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1049  A8D9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A8D9              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A8D9              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A8D9              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A8D9              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A8D9              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A8D9              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A8D9 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A8DC 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A8DD 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A8DE              .sqrloop:
  11+ A8DE CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A8E0 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A8E2 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A8E3 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A8E4 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A8E6 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A8E8 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A8E9 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A8EA 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A8EC              .sqrbit:
  21+ A8EC 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A8ED EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A8EE B7           	or a
  24+ A8EF ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A8F1              .sqrfi:
  26+ A8F1 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A8F3 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A8F5 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A8F7 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A8F9 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A8FB C9           	ret
  32+ A8FC
  33+ A8FC
  34+ A8FC              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A8FC 3A D7 97     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A8FF 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A900 3A D8 97     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A903 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A904 CD D9 A8     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A907 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A908 32 D7 97     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A90B C9           	ret
  43+ A90C
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1050  A90C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A90C              ;
   2+ A90C              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ A90C              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ A90C              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ A90C              ;               if a >= D
   6+ A90C              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ A90C              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ A90C              ;           else
   9+ A90C
  10+ A90C              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ A90C              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ A90C              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ A90C              ;
  14+ A90C              ;
  15+ A90C              ;
  16+ A90C
  17+ A90C              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  17+ A90C BA          >                        cp     d
  17+ A90D D2 2B A9    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  18+ A910 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  19+ A912 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  20+ A914 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  21+ A916                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  21+ A916 BA          >                        cp      d
  21+ A917 DA 1C A9    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  22+ A91A 92                                   sub     d
  23+ A91B                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  23+ A91B B7          >                        or a
  24+ A91C              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  24+ A91C 3F          >                        ccf
  25+ A91D CB 13                                rl      e
  26+ A91F 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  27+ A921 7B                                   ld      a,e
  28+ A922 C9                                   ret
  29+ A923 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  30+ A924                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  30+ A924 37          >                        scf
  31+ A925 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  32+ A927 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  33+ A929 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  34+ A92A C9                                   ret
  35+ A92B 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  36+ A92D C9                                   ret
  37+ A92E
  38+ A92E
  39+ A92E              ; Divide 8-bit values
  40+ A92E              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  41+ A92E              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  42+ A92E              ;
  43+ A92E              ;;;Div8:
  44+ A92E              ;;;    xor a
  45+ A92E              ;;;    ld b,8
  46+ A92E              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  47+ A92E              ;;;    rl e
  48+ A92E              ;;;    rla
  49+ A92E              ;;;    sub c
  50+ A92E              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  51+ A92E              ;;;    add a,c
  52+ A92E              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  53+ A92E              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  54+ A92E              ;;;    ld b,a0
  55+ A92E              ;;;    ld a,e
  56+ A92E              ;;;    rla
  57+ A92E              ;;;    cpl
  58+ A92E              ;;;    ret
  59+ A92E
  60+ A92E              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  61+ A92E              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  62+ A92E              ;;         A is a copy of E
  63+ A92E              ;;         HL is the remainder
  64+ A92E              ;;         BC is not changed
  65+ A92E              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  66+ A92E              ;140 bytes
  67+ A92E              ;145cc
  68+ A92E
  69+ A92E              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  70+ A92E ~                                rla
  71+ A92E ~                                adc     hl,hl
  72+ A92E ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  73+ A92E ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  74+ A92E ~                                add     hl,bc
  75+ A92E                                  ENDM
  76+ A92E
  77+ A92E              DEequDEDivBC:
  78+ A92E AF               xor a
  79+ A92F ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  80+ A931 7A               ld a,d
  81+ A932                  MacroDEDivBC
  81+ A932 17          >                    rla
  81+ A933 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  81+ A935 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  81+ A937 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  81+ A939 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  82+ A93A                  MacroDEDivBC
  82+ A93A 17          >                    rla
  82+ A93B ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  82+ A93D ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  82+ A93F 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  82+ A941 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 104+ A9B8 5F               ld e,a

 106+ A9BA
 107+ A9BA
 108+ A9BA
 109+ A9BA              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 110+ A9BA              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 111+ A9BA              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 112+ A9BA              ; Our use
 113+ A9BA              ; BC = A0
 114+ A9BA              ; DE = 0C
 115+ A9BA              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 116+ A9BA              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 116+ A9BA B9          >                        cp     c
 116+ A9BB D2 E6 A9    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 117+ A9BE 47                                   ld      b,a
 118+ A9BF 59                                   ld      e,c
 119+ A9C0 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 120+ A9C2 16 00                                ld      d,0
 121+ A9C4 C3 D1 A9                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 122+ A9C7 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 123+ A9C8 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 124+ A9CA 21 D7 97                             ld      hl,varQ
 125+ A9CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 126+ A9CE 16 00                                ld      d,0
 127+ A9D0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 128+ A9D1              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 129+ A9D1 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 130+ A9D4 78                                   ld      a,b
 131+ A9D5 06 10                                ld      b,16
 132+ A9D7 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 133+ A9D9 17                                   rla			; ...
 134+ A9DA ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 135+ A9DC ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 136+ A9DE 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 137+ A9E0 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 138+ A9E1 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 139+ A9E2 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 140+ A9E4 47                                   ld   b,a
 141+ A9E5 C9                                   ret
 142+ A9E6 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 143+ A9E9 C9                                   ret
 144+ A9EA
 145+ A9EA              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 146+ A9EA 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 147+ A9EC AF                                   xor a
 148+ A9ED CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 149+ A9EF 17                                   rla
 150+ A9F0 BA                                   cp d
 151+ A9F1 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 151+ A9F3
 152+ A9F3 0C                                   inc c
 153+ A9F4 92                                   sub d
 154+ A9F5 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 155+ A9F7 C9                                   ret
 156+ A9F8              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 157+ A9F8 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 158+ A9FA AF                                   xor a
 159+ A9FB CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 160+ A9FD CB 14                                rl	h
 161+ A9FF              ;    add hl,hl
 162+ A9FF 17                                   rla
 163+ AA00 B9                                   cp c
 164+ AA01 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 165+ AA03 2C                                   inc l
 166+ AA04 91                                   sub c
 167+ AA05 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 168+ AA07 C9                                   ret
 169+ AA08              ;
 170+ AA08              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 171+ AA08              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 172+ AA08              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 173+ AA08              ;
 174+ AA08              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 175+ AA08 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 176+ AA08 ~            					rla				; ...
 177+ AA08 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 178+ AA08 ~            					jr	1F
 179+ AA08 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 180+ AA08 ~            1:
 181+ AA08 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 182+ AA08              					ENDM
 183+ AA08
 184+ AA08
 185+ AA08
 186+ AA08              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 187+ AA08 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 188+ AA0B 78                               ld a,b
 189+ AA0C 06 08                            ld b,8
 190+ AA0E 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 191+ AA0F ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 192+ AA11 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 193+ AA13 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 194+ AA15 19                               add hl,de
 195+ AA16 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 196+ AA18 17                               rla
 197+ AA19 2F                               cpl
 198+ AA1A 47                               ld b,a
 199+ AA1B 79                               ld a,c
 200+ AA1C 48                               ld c,b
 201+ AA1D 06 08                            ld b,8
 202+ AA1F 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 203+ AA20 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 204+ AA22 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 205+ AA24 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 206+ AA26 19                               add hl,de
 207+ AA27 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 208+ AA29 17                               rla
 209+ AA2A 2F                               cpl
 210+ AA2B 41                               ld b,c
 211+ AA2C 4F                               ld c,a
 212+ AA2D C9                               ret
 213+ AA2E
 214+ AA2E
 215+ AA2E
 216+ AA2E              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 217+ AA2E ~            				   rla
 218+ AA2E ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ AA2E ~            				   add	hl,de
 220+ AA2E ~            				   jr	c,1F
 221+ AA2E ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ AA2E ~            1:
 223+ AA2E              				   ENDM
 224+ AA2E
 225+ AA2E
 226+ AA2E              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 227+ AA2E              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 228+ AA2E              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 229+ AA2E              ;min: 738cc
 230+ AA2E              ;max: 898cc
 231+ AA2E              ;avg: 818cc
 232+ AA2E              ;144 bytes
 233+ AA2E AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 234+ AA2F 67                                   ld h,a
 235+ AA30 6F                                   ld l,a
 236+ AA31 93                                   sub e
 237+ AA32 5F                                   ld e,a
 238+ AA33 9F                                   sbc a,a
 239+ AA34 92                                   sub d
 240+ AA35 57                                   ld d,a
 241+ AA36 78                                   ld a,b
 242+ AA37                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 242+ AA37 17          >				   rla
 242+ AA38 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 242+ AA3A 19          >				   add	hl,de
 242+ AA3B 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 242+ AA3D ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 242+ AA3F             >1:
 243+ AA3F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 243+ AA3F 17          >				   rla
 243+ AA40 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 243+ AA42 19          >				   add	hl,de
 243+ AA43 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 243+ AA45 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 243+ AA47             >1:
 244+ AA47                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 244+ AA47 17          >				   rla
 244+ AA48 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 244+ AA4A 19          >				   add	hl,de
 244+ AA4B 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 244+ AA4D ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 244+ AA4F             >1:
 245+ AA4F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 245+ AA4F 17          >				   rla
 245+ AA50 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 245+ AA52 19          >				   add	hl,de
 245+ AA53 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 245+ AA55 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 245+ AA57             >1:
 246+ AA57                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 246+ AA57 17          >				   rla
 246+ AA58 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 246+ AA5A 19          >				   add	hl,de
 246+ AA5B 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 246+ AA5D ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 246+ AA5F             >1:
 247+ AA5F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 247+ AA5F 17          >				   rla
 247+ AA60 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 247+ AA62 19          >				   add	hl,de
 247+ AA63 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 247+ AA65 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 247+ AA67             >1:
 248+ AA67                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 248+ AA67 17          >				   rla
 248+ AA68 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 248+ AA6A 19          >				   add	hl,de
 248+ AA6B 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 248+ AA6D ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 248+ AA6F             >1:
 249+ AA6F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 249+ AA6F 17          >				   rla
 249+ AA70 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 249+ AA72 19          >				   add	hl,de
 249+ AA73 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 249+ AA75 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 249+ AA77             >1:
 250+ AA77 17                                   rla
 251+ AA78 47                                   ld b,a
 252+ AA79
 253+ AA79 79                                   ld a,c
 254+ AA7A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 254+ AA7A 17          >				   rla
 254+ AA7B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 254+ AA7D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 254+ AA7E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 254+ AA80 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 254+ AA82             >1:
 255+ AA82                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 255+ AA82 17          >				   rla
 255+ AA83 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 255+ AA85 19          >				   add	hl,de
 255+ AA86 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 255+ AA88 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 255+ AA8A             >1:
 256+ AA8A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 256+ AA8A 17          >				   rla
 256+ AA8B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 256+ AA8D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 256+ AA8E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 256+ AA90 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 256+ AA92             >1:
 257+ AA92                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 257+ AA92 17          >				   rla
 257+ AA93 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 257+ AA95 19          >				   add	hl,de
 257+ AA96 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 257+ AA98 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 257+ AA9A             >1:
 258+ AA9A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 258+ AA9A 17          >				   rla
 258+ AA9B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 258+ AA9D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 258+ AA9E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 258+ AAA0 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 258+ AAA2             >1:
 259+ AAA2                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 259+ AAA2 17          >				   rla
 259+ AAA3 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 259+ AAA5 19          >				   add	hl,de
 259+ AAA6 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 259+ AAA8 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 259+ AAAA             >1:
 260+ AAAA                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 260+ AAAA 17          >				   rla
 260+ AAAB ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 260+ AAAD 19          >				   add	hl,de
 260+ AAAE 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 260+ AAB0 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 260+ AAB2             >1:
 261+ AAB2                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 261+ AAB2 17          >				   rla
 261+ AAB3 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 261+ AAB5 19          >				   add	hl,de
 261+ AAB6 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 261+ AAB8 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 261+ AABA             >1:
 262+ AABA 17                                   rla
 263+ AABB 4F                                   ld c,a
 264+ AABC C9                                   ret
 265+ AABD
 266+ AABD              ;Inputs:
 267+ AABD              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 268+ AABD              ;Outputs:
 269+ AABD              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 270+ AABD              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 271+ AABD              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 272+ AABD              ;Otherwise:
 273+ AABD              ;min: 1107cc
 274+ AABD              ;max: 1319cc
 275+ AABD              ;avg: 1201cc
 276+ AABD 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 277+ AABE AA                                   xor d
 278+ AABF F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 279+ AAC0              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 280+ AAC0 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 281+ AAC1 F2 CA AA                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 282+ AAC4 AF                                   xor a
 283+ AAC5 91                                   sub c
 284+ AAC6 4F                                   ld c,a
 285+ AAC7 9F                                   sbc a,a
 286+ AAC8 90                                   sub b
 287+ AAC9 47                                   ld b,a
 288+ AACA 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 289+ AACB B2                                   or d
 290+ AACC FA D5 AA                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 291+ AACF AF                                   xor a
 292+ AAD0 93                                   sub e
 293+ AAD1 5F                                   ld e,a
 294+ AAD2 9F                                   sbc a,a
 295+ AAD3 92                                   sub d
 296+ AAD4 57                                   ld d,a
 297+ AAD5 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 298+ AAD6 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 299+ AAD8 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 300+ AADA 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 301+ AADB 83                                   add a,e
 302+ AADC 7A                                   ld a,d
 303+ AADD 8C                                   adc a,h
 304+ AADE 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 305+ AAE0 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 306+ AAE1 79                                   ld a,c
 307+ AAE2 CD FD AA                             call div_fixed88_sub
 308+ AAE5 4F                                   ld c,a
 309+ AAE6 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 310+ AAE7 CD FD AA                             call div_fixed88_sub
 311+ AAEA 51                                   ld d,c
 312+ AAEB 5F                                   ld e,a
 313+ AAEC F1                                   pop af
 314+ AAED F0                                   ret p
 315+ AAEE AF                                   xor a
 316+ AAEF 93                                   sub e
 317+ AAF0 5F                                   ld e,a
 318+ AAF1 9F                                   sbc a,a
 319+ AAF2 92                                   sub d
 320+ AAF3 57                                   ld d,a
 321+ AAF4 C9                                   ret
 322+ AAF5
 323+ AAF5 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 324+ AAF8 F1                                   pop af
 325+ AAF9 F0                                   ret p
 326+ AAFA 13                                   inc de
 327+ AAFB 1C                                   inc e
 328+ AAFC C9                                   ret
 329+ AAFD
 330+ AAFD              ;min: 456cc
 331+ AAFD              ;max: 536cc
 332+ AAFD              ;avg: 496cc
 333+ AAFD 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 334+ AAFF 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 335+ AB00 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 336+ AB02 19                                   add hl,de
 337+ AB03 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 338+ AB05 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 339+ AB07 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 340+ AB09 8F                                   adc a,a
 341+ AB0A C9                                   ret
 342+ AB0B
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1051  AB0B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ AB0B              asm_tis2:
   2+ AB0B              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ AB0B              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ AB0B F5           	push af
   5+ AB0C E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ AB0E 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ AB0F 3A D7 97     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ AB12 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ AB13 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ AB14 BB           	cp e
  11+ AB15 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ AB17 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ AB19 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ AB1B EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AB1C 3A D7 97     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ AB1F 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ AB20 CD F8 A9     	call asm_div16
  18+ AB23 F1           	pop af
  19+ AB24 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ AB26 B5           	or l
  21+ AB27 C9           	ret
  22+ AB28              .tis2_set96:
  23+ AB28 F1           	pop af
  24+ AB29 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ AB2B F6 96        	or $96
  26+ AB2D C9           	ret
  27+ AB2E
  28+ AB2E
  29+ AB2E              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ AB2E              squareregfx:
  31+ AB2E 3A 82 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ AB31 57           	ld d,a
  33+ AB32 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ AB33 ED 30        	mul
  35+ AB35 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ AB36              squareregfy:
  37+ AB36 3A 84 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ AB39 57           	ld d,a
  39+ AB3A 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ AB3B ED 30        	mul
  41+ AB3D 19           	add hl,de
  42+ AB3E              squareregfz:
  43+ AB3E 3A 86 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ AB41 57           	ld d,a
  45+ AB42 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ AB43 ED 30        	mul
  47+ AB45 19           	add hl,de
  48+ AB46 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ AB47              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ AB47 CD D9 A8     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ AB4A E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ AB4B E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ AB4C E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ AB4D              normfx:
  55+ AB4D 3A 82 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ AB50 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ AB51 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ AB52 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ AB53 CD 0B AB     	call asm_tis2
  60+ AB56 32 82 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ AB59              normfy:
  62+ AB59 3A 84 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ AB5C E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ AB5D 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ AB5E 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ AB5F CD 0B AB     	call asm_tis2
  67+ AB62 32 84 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ AB65              normfz:
  69+ AB65 3A 86 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ AB68 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ AB69 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ AB6A 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ AB6B CD 0B AB     	call asm_tis2
  74+ AB6E 32 86 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ AB71              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ AB71 C9           	ret
  77+ AB72
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1052  AB72                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ AB72              ; Input:
   2+ AB72              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ AB72              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ AB72              ; Output:
   5+ AB72              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ AB72              ;
   7+ AB72              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ AB72              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ AB72              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ AB72              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ AB72              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ AB72              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ AB72              ;
  14+ AB72
  15+ AB72 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ AB73 A7                               and     a
  17+ AB74 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ AB76 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ AB77 C9                               ret
  20+ AB78
  21+ AB78              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ AB78              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ AB78
  24+ AB78 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ AB7A 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ AB7B E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ AB7D 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ AB7E 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ AB7F E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ AB81 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ AB82 A7                               and     a
  32+ AB83 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ AB85 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ AB87 C9                               ret
  35+ AB88
  36+ AB88
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1053  AB88                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ AB88              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ AB88              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ AB88              negate16:
   4+ AB88              negate16hl:
   5+ AB88                      ; Input:
   6+ AB88                      ;       HL = value
   7+ AB88                      ; Output:
   8+ AB88                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ AB88                      ; Destroys:
  10+ AB88                      ;       AF
  11+ AB88                      ;
  12+ AB88 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ AB89 95           	sub 	l
  14+ AB8A 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ AB8B 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ AB8C 94           	sub 	h
  17+ AB8D 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ AB8E C9           	ret
  19+ AB8F
  20+ AB8F              negate16de:
  21+ AB8F AF           	xor 	a
  22+ AB90 93           	sub 	e
  23+ AB91 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ AB92 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ AB93 92           	sub 	d
  26+ AB94 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ AB95 C9           	ret
  28+ AB96
  29+ AB96              negate16bc:
  30+ AB96 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ AB97 91           	sub 	c
  32+ AB98 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ AB99 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ AB9A 90           	sub 	b
  35+ AB9B 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ AB9C C9           	ret
  37+ AB9D
  38+ AB9D
  39+ AB9D              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ AB9D ~            					xor 	a
  41+ AB9D ~            					sub 	l
  42+ AB9D ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ AB9D ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ AB9D ~            					sub 	h
  45+ AB9D ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ AB9D              					ENDM
  47+ AB9D
  48+ AB9D              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ AB9D ~            					xor 	a
  50+ AB9D ~                                sub 	e
  51+ AB9D ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ AB9D ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ AB9D ~                                sub 	d
  54+ AB9D ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ AB9D              					ENDM
  56+ AB9D              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ AB9D ~            					xor 	a
  58+ AB9D ~                                sub 	c
  59+ AB9D ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ AB9D ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ AB9D ~                                sub 	b
  62+ AB9D ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ AB9D              					ENDM
  64+ AB9D
  65+ AB9D              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ AB9D ~            					xor 	a
  67+ AB9D ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ AB9D ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ AB9D ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ AB9D ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ AB9D ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ AB9D              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1054  AB9D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ AB9D DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ AB9F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ AB9F BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ ABA0 D2 B5 AB    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ ABA3 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ ABA4 CD EA A9                             call		asm_div8
   5+ ABA7 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ ABA8 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ ABAA 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ ABAB CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ ABAD 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ ABAE 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ ABAF DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ ABB1 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ ABB3 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ ABB4 C9                                   ret
  15+ ABB5              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ ABB5              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ ABB5 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ ABB7 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ ABB9 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ ABBB C9                                   ret
  21+ ABBC
  22+ ABBC
  23+ ABBC
  24+ ABBC
  25+ ABBC              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ ABBC                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ ABBC 3A 82 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ ABBF DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ ABC1 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ ABC3              N96SQX:
  31+ ABC3              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ ABC3 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ ABC4 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ ABC5 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ ABC7 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ ABC8 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ ABC9              N96SQY:
  35+ ABC9 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ ABCC DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ ABCE E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ ABD0              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ ABD0 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ ABD1 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ ABD2 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ ABD4 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ ABD5              N96SQZ:
  41+ ABD5 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ ABD8 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ ABDA E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ ABDC              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ ABDC 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ ABDD 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ ABDE ED 30       >			mul
  45+ ABE0              N96SQADD:
  46+ ABE0 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ ABE1 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ ABE2              N96SQRT:
  49+ ABE2 CD D9 A8     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ ABE5              N96NORMX:
  51+ ABE5 3A 82 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ ABE8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ ABEA 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ ABEB 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ ABEC CD 13 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ ABEF 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ ABF0 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ ABF2 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ ABF4 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ ABF5 32 82 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ ABF8              N96NORMY:
  62+ ABF8 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ ABFB E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ ABFD 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ ABFE 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ ABFF CD 13 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ AC02 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ AC03 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ AC05 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ AC07 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ AC08 32 83 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ AC0B              N96NORMZ:
  73+ AC0B 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ AC0E E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ AC10 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ AC11 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ AC12 CD 13 AE     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ AC15 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ AC16 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ AC18 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ AC1A B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ AC1B 32 84 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ AC1E C9           	ret
  84+ AC1F
  85+ AC1F              ; Normalise vector
  86+ AC1F              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ AC1F              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ AC1F              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ AC1F              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ AC1F              ;
  91+ AC1F              ;
  92+ AC1F              ;
  93+ AC1F
  94+ AC1F              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ AC1F 3A 82 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ AC22                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ AC22 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ AC23 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ AC24 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ AC26 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ AC27 32 D8 97                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ AC2A 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ AC2B 32 D7 97                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ AC2E 32 D0 96                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ AC31 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ AC34                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ AC34 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ AC35 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ AC36 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ AC38 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ AC39 32 F4 97                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ AC3C 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ AC3D 32 D0 96                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ AC40 21 D7 97                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ AC43 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ AC44 32 D7 97                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ AC47 3A F4 97                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ AC4A 21 D8 97                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ AC4D 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ AC4E 32 D8 97                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ AC51 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ AC54                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ AC54 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ AC55 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ AC56 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ AC58 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ AC59 32 F4 97                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ AC5C 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ AC5D 32 D0 96                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ AC60 21 D7 97                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ AC63 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ AC64 32 D7 97                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ AC67 3A F4 97                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ AC6A 21 D8 97                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ AC6D 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ AC6E 32 D8 97                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ AC71 CD FC A8                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ AC74 3A 82 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ AC77 CD 0D AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ AC7A 32 82 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ AC7D 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ AC80 CD 0D AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ AC83 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ AC86 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ AC89 CD 0D AE                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ AC8C 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ AC8F C9                                   ret
 139+ AC90
 140+ AC90
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1055  AC90                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ AC90              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ AC90              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ AC90              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ AC90              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ AC90              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ AC90              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ AC90              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ AC90 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ AC93 CD A9 AC     	call	Num1
  10+ AC96 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ AC99 CD A9 AC     	call	Num1
  12+ AC9C 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ AC9F CD A9 AC     	call	Num1
  14+ ACA2 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ ACA4 CD A9 AC     	call	Num1
  16+ ACA7 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ ACA9              Num1:
  18+ ACA9 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ ACAB              .Num2:
  20+ ACAB 3C           	inc	a
  21+ ACAC 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ ACAD 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ ACAF ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ ACB1 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ ACB2 13           	inc	de
  26+ ACB3 C9           	ret
  27+ ACB4
  28+ ACB4              DispAtoDE:
  29+ ACB4 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ ACB6 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ ACB7 C3 90 AC     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ ACBA
  33+ ACBA              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ ACBA 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ ACBC 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ ACBD 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ ACC0 CD D0 AC     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ ACC3 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ ACC5 CD A9 AC     	call	Num1
  40+ ACC8 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ ACCA 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ ACCB 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ ACCC 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ ACCE 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ ACD0              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ ACD0 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ ACD2              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ ACD2 3C           	inc	a
  49+ ACD3 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ ACD4 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ ACD6 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ ACD8 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ ACDA              .Blank:
  54+ ACDA 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ ACDC              .DontBlank:
  56+ ACDC ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ ACDE 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ ACDF 13           	inc	de
  59+ ACE0 C9           	ret
  60+ ACE1
  61+ ACE1              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ ACE1 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ ACE3 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ ACE5 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ ACE7 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ ACE8 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ ACEB CD F7 AC     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ ACEE 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ ACF0 CD F7 AC     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ ACF3 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ ACF5 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ ACF7              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ ACF7 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ ACF9              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ ACF9 3C           	inc	a
  76+ ACFA 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ ACFB 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ ACFD FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ ACFF 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ AD01              .Blank:
  81+ AD01 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ AD03              .DontBlank:
  83+ AD03 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ AD05 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ AD06 13           	inc	de
  86+ AD07 C9           	ret
  87+ AD08              .NoStock:
  88+ AD08 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ AD0A 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ AD0B 13           	inc	de
  91+ AD0C 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ AD0D 13           	inc	de
  93+ AD0E 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ AD10 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ AD11 13           	inc de
  96+ AD12 C9           	ret
  97+ AD13
  98+ AD13
  99+ AD13              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ AD13              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ AD13              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ AD13              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ AD13 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ AD17 0A 00 00 00
 103+ AD1B 64 00 00 00
 103+ AD1F E8 03 00 00
 103+ AD23 10 27 00 00
 104+ AD27 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ AD2B 40 42 0F 00
 104+ AD2F 80 96 98 00
 104+ AD33 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ AD37 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ AD3B 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ AD3F
 107+ AD3F              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ AD3F CD 4E AD     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ AD42 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ AD45 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ AD48 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ AD4A FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ AD4D C9                                   ret
 114+ AD4E
 115+ AD4E DD 22 3B AD  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ AD52 ED 53 3D AD                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ AD56 DD 21 37 AD                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ AD5A 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ AD5C 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ AD5E 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ AD60 B7                                   or a
 122+ AD61 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ AD64 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ AD67 2A 3B AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ AD6A ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ AD6C 22 3B AD                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ AD6F DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ AD72 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ AD75 2A 3D AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ AD78 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ AD7A 22 3D AD                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ AD7D 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ AD7F 0C                                   inc c
 134+ AD80 3C                                   inc a
 135+ AD81 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ AD83 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ AD86 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ AD89 2A 3B AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ AD8C 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ AD8D 22 3B AD                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ AD90 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ AD93 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ AD96 2A 3D AD                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ AD99 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ AD9B 22 3D AD                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ AD9E 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ ADA1 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ ADA3 0C                                   inc c
 149+ ADA4 0D                                   dec c
 150+ ADA5 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ ADA7 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ ADAA FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ ADAC 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ ADAE 3A 3B AD                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ ADB1 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ ADB3 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ ADB6 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ ADBA C9                                   ret
 159+ ADBB
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1056  ADBB                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ ADBB              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ ADBB              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ ADBB              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ ADBB 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ ADBC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ ADBE A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ ADBF                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ ADBF FA CD AD    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ ADC2 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ ADC3 B1                                   or      c
  10+ ADC4                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ ADC4 FA C9 AD    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ ADC7 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ ADC8 C9                                   ret
  13+ ADC9 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ ADCA 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ ADCB B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ ADCC C9                                   ret
  17+ ADCD B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ ADCE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ ADD0 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ ADD2 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ ADD3 C9                                   ret
  22+ ADD4              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ ADD4 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ ADD5 95          >                    sub l
  22+ ADD6 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ ADD7 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ ADD8 94          >                    sub h
  22+ ADD9 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ ADDA 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ ADDB EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ ADDD C9                                   ret
  26+ ADDE
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1057  ADDE              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1058  ADDE              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1059  ADDE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ ADDE              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ ADDE BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ ADDF D2 FA AD    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ ADE2 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ ADE4 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ ADE6                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ ADE6 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ ADE7 DA FD AD    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ ADEA 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ ADEB 37                                   scf
   7+ ADEC CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ ADEE 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ ADF0 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ ADF1 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ ADF3 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ ADF5 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ ADF6 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ ADF8 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ ADF9 C9                                   ret
  16+ ADFA 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ ADFC C9                                   ret
  18+ ADFD B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ ADFE CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ AE00 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ AE02 C3 F0 AD                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ AE05
  23+ AE05
  24+ AE05              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ AE05              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ AE05              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ AE05 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ AE07 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ AE09 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ AE0B CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ AE0D              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ AE0D              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ AE0D              TIS2:
  34+ AE0D 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ AE0E 3A D7 97     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ AE11 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ AE12 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ AE13              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ AE13 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ AE14 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ AE16              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ AE16 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ AE17 D2 37 AE    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ AE1A 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ AE1C              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ AE1C CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ AE1E              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ AE1E BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ AE1F DA 3D AE    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ AE22 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ AE23 37           	scf
  48+ AE24 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ AE26 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ AE28              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ AE28 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ AE29 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ AE2B CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ AE2D 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ AE2E CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ AE30 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ AE31 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ AE32 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ AE33 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ AE35 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ AE36 C9           	ret
  62+ AE37              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ AE37              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ AE37 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ AE38 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ AE3A F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ AE3C C9           	ret
  68+ AE3D              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ AE3D B7           	or			a
  70+ AE3E CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ AE40 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ AE42 C3 28 AE     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ AE45
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1060  AE45                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ AE45              fmltu:
   2+ AE45              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ AE45              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ AE45 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ AE46 3A D7 97     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ AE49 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AE4A ED 30        	mul
   8+ AE4C 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ AE4D C9           	ret
  10+ AE4E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1061  AE4E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ AE4E              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ AE4E              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ AE4E 21 A3 9A     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ AE51 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ AE53 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ AE55 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ AE56 C3 62 AE     		jp		DV41
   8+ AE59              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ AE59 21 A3 9A     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ AE5C 3A BE 96     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ AE5F ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ AE61 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ AE62              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ AE62 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ AE63 3A D3 97     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ AE66              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ AE66 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ AE68 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ AE6A 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ AE6B AF           		xor		a
  21+ AE6C              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ AE6C CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ AE6E 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ AE70 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ AE71 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ AE73              DV8:
  27+ AE73 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ AE74 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ AE75              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ AE75 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ AE77 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ AE79              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ AE79              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ AE79 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ AE7B 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ AE7C              .RollRemainder:
  37+ AE7C CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ AE7E 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ AE80 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ AE81 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ AE83              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ AE83 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ AE84              .DontSBC:
  44+ AE84 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ AE86 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ AE88 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ AE89 32 D8 97     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ AE8C 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ AE8D 32 D0 96     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ AE90 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ AE91              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ AE91 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ AE92 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ AE93 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ AE95 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ AE97 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ AE98 32 D8 97     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ AE9B 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ AE9C 32 D0 96     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ AE9F C9           		ret
  61+ AEA0              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ AEA0 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ AEA2 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ AEA3 32 D8 97     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ AEA6 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ AEA7 32 D0 96     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ AEAA C9           		ret
  68+ AEAB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1062  AEAB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ AEAB
   2+ AEAB              asm_defmutl:
   3+ AEAB              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ AEAB              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ AEAB ED 30        	mul
   6+ AEAD 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ AEAE C9           	ret
   8+ AEAF
   9+ AEAF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1063  AEAF              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1064  AEAF              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1065  AEAF              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1066  AEAF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ AEAF              APequQmulA:
   2+ AEAF              asm_mult1:
   3+ AEAF              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ AEAF FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ AEB1 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ AEB3 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AEB4 3A D7 97     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ AEB7 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ AEB8 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ AEBA 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ AEBC AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ AEBD E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ AEBF 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ AEC0 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ AEC1 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ AEC3 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ AEC4 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ AEC5 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ AEC7 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ AEC8 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ AECA 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ AECB 32 D0 96     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ AECE 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ AECF B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ AED0 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ AED1 C9           	ret
  27+ AED2              .mul0:
  28+ AED2 AF           	xor	a
  29+ AED3 32 D0 96     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ AED6 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ AED7 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ AED8 C9           	ret
  33+ AED9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1067  AED9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ AED9              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ AED9              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ AED9              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ AED9              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ AED9              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ AED9              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ AED9              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ AED9              LL38:
   9+ AED9              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ AED9              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ AED9              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ AED9              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ AED9              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ AED9              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ AED9              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ AED9              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ AED9              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ AED9              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ AED9              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ AED9              ;	ret
  21+ AED9              ; calculation table
  22+ AED9              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ AED9              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ AED9              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ AED9              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ AED9              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ AED9              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ AED9              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
