  29+ AED9              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ AED9              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ AED9
  32+ AED9              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ AED9              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ AED9              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ AED9              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ AED9
  37+ AED9
  38+ AED9              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ AED9 21 D9 97     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ AEDC AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ AEDD FA E8 AE     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ AEE0 3A D7 97     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ AEE3 21 D8 97     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ AEE6 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ AEE7 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ AEE8              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ AEE8 3A D8 97     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ AEEB 21 D7 97     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ AEEE              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ AEEE              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ AEEE B7          >                        or a
  51+ AEEF 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ AEF0 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ AEF2              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ AEF2              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ AEF2              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ AEF2 C9           	ret
  57+ AEF3              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ AEF3 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ AEF5 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ AEF7 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ AEF9 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ AEFA 3A D9 97     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ AEFD EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ AEFF 32 D9 97     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ AF02 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ AF03                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ AF03 B7          >                        or a
  67+ AF04 C9           	ret
  68+ AF05              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ AF05 32 D9 97         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ AF08                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ AF08 B7          >                        or a
  71+ AF09 C9               ret
  72+ AF0A              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ AF0A              ;--	push	bc
  74+ AF0A              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ AF0A              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ AF0A              ;--	sub		b
  77+ AF0A              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ AF0A              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ AF0A              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ AF0A              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ AF0A              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ AF0A              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ AF0A              ;--	ret
  84+ AF0A
  85+ AF0A              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ AF0A              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ AF0A              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ AF0A              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ AF0A              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ AF0A              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ AF0A              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ AF0A              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ AF0A              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ AF0A              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ AF0A              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ AF0A              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ AF0A              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ AF0A              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ AF0A              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ AF0A              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ AF0A              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ AF0A              ;;;;	ret
 109+ AF0A              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ AF0A              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ AF0A              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ AF0A              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ AF0A              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ AF0A              ;;;;	ret
 117+ AF0A              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ AF0A              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ AF0A              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ AF0A              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ AF0A              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ AF0A              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ AF0A              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ AF0A              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ AF0A              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ AF0A              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ AF0A              ;;;;	ret
 134+ AF0A              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ AF0A              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ AF0A              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ AF0A              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ AF0A              ;;;;	ret
 141+ AF0A
 142+ AF0A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1068  AF0A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ AF0A              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ AF0A              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ AF0A              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ AF0A
   5+ AF0A
   6+ AF0A              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ AF0A 3A BE 96     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ AF0D 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ AF0E              moveship4breg:
  10+ AF0E              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ AF0E              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ AF0E              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ AF0E 3A ED 96     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ AF11 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ AF14 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ AF17 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ AF18 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ AF1A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ AF1B 32 D8 97     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ AF1E 23           		inc		hl
  21+ AF1F 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ AF20 32 D9 97     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ AF23 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ AF24 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ AF25 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ AF26 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ AF27 32 D0 96     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ AF2A 23           		inc		hl
  29+ AF2B 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ AF2C EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ AF2E CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ AF31 23                   inc     hl
  33+ AF32 23                   inc     hl
  34+ AF33 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ AF34 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ AF35 3A BD 96             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ AF38 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ AF39 32 D0 96             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ AF3C 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ AF3D 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ AF3E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ AF3F 32 D8 97             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ AF42 23                   inc     hl
  44+ AF43 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ AF44 32 D9 97             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ AF47 23                   inc     hl
  47+ AF48 23                   inc     hl
  48+ AF49 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ AF4A CD AF A7             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ AF4D 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ AF4E 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ AF4F 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ AF50 3A BD 96             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ AF53 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ AF54 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ AF55 32 D0 96             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ AF58 3A DC 96             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ AF5B 32 D7 97             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ AF5E 23                   inc     hl
  60+ AF5F 23                   inc     hl
  61+ AF60 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ AF61 32 D8 97             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ AF64 23                   inc     hl
  64+ AF65 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ AF66 32 D9 97             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ AF69 23                   inc     hl
  67+ AF6A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ AF6B 32 D0 96             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ AF6E 23                   inc     hl
  70+ AF6F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ AF70 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ AF72 CD AF A7             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ AF75 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ AF76 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ AF77 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ AF78 3A BD 96             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ AF7B 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ AF7C 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ AF7D 32 D0 96             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ AF80 23                   inc     hl
  81+ AF81 23                   inc     hl
  82+ AF82 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ AF83 32 D8 97             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ AF86 23                   inc     hl
  85+ AF87 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ AF88 32 D9 97             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ AF8B 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ AF8C 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ AF8D 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ AF8E CD AF A7             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ AF91 23                   inc     hl
  92+ AF92 23                   inc     hl
  93+ AF93 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ AF94 3A BD 96             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ AF97 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ AF98 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ AF99 C9                   ret
  98+ AF9A
  99+ AF9A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
1069  AF9A              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
1070  AF9A              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
1071  AF9A              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
1072  AF9A              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
1073  AF9A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ AF9A              ;;;LL28:
   2+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ AF9A              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ AF9A              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ AF9A              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ AF9A              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ AF9A              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ AF9A              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ AF9A              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ AF9A              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ AF9A              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ AF9A              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ AF9A              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ AF9A              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ AF9A              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ AF9A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ AF9A              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ AF9A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ AF9A              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ AF9A              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ AF9A              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ AF9A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ AF9A              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ AF9A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ AF9A              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ AF9A              ;;;	ret
  34+ AF9A              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ AF9A              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ AF9A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ AF9A              ;;;	ret
  39+ AF9A
  40+ AF9A              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ AF9A 59             ld    e,c
  42+ AF9B 67             ld    h,a
  43+ AF9C 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ AF9E              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ AF9E 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ AF9F B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ AFA0 C8             ret z
  48+ AFA1 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ AFA4 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ AFA6              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ AFA6 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ AFA8 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ AFA9 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ AFAB C9             ret
  55+ AFAC
  56+ AFAC              HL_Div_C:
  57+ AFAC              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ AFAC              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ AFAC              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ AFAC 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ AFAE AF                   xor a
  62+ AFAF              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ AFAF 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ AFB0 17                   rla
  65+ AFB1 B9                   cp c
  66+ AFB2 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ AFB4 91                   sub c
  68+ AFB5 2C                   inc l
  69+ AFB6              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ AFB6 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ AFB8 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ AFB9 32 D8 97             ld  (varR),a
  73+ AFBC C9                   ret
  74+ AFBD
  75+ AFBD
  76+ AFBD
  77+ AFBD              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ AFBD              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ AFBD              BFRDIV:
  80+ AFBD F5           		push	af
  81+ AFBE 3A D7 97     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ AFC1 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ AFC2 F1           		pop		af
  84+ AFC3 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ AFC5 CA DC AF     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ AFC8              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ AFC8 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ AFCA 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ AFCB              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ AFCB 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ AFCD AF           		xor a
  92+ AFCE              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ AFCE 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ AFCF 17           		rla
  95+ AFD0 B9           		cp c
  96+ AFD1 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ AFD3 2C           		inc l
  98+ AFD4 91           		sub c
  99+ AFD5              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ AFD5 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ AFD7 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ AFD8 32 D8 97     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ AFDB C9           		ret
 104+ AFDC              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ AFDC 32 D8 97     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ AFDF C9           		ret
 107+ AFE0              ;	push	af
 108+ AFE0              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ AFE0              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ AFE0              ;	pop		af
 111+ AFE0              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ AFE0              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ AFE0              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ AFE0              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ AFE0              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ AFE0              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ AFE0              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ AFE0              ;	sla		a
 119+ AFE0              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ AFE0              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ AFE0              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ AFE0              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ AFE0              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ AFE0              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ AFE0              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ AFE0              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ AFE0              ;	scf
 128+ AFE0              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ AFE0              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ AFE0              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ AFE0              ;LL2:
 132+ AFE0              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ AFE0              ;LL2Good:
 134+ AFE0              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ AFE0              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ AFE0              ;	ret
 137+ AFE0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1074  AFE0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ AFE0              RequAdivQ:
   2+ AFE0              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ AFE0              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ AFE0 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ AFE1 3A D7 97     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ AFE4 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ AFE6 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ AFE8 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ AFE9 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ AFEB AF               xor a
  11+ AFEC              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ AFEC CB 21            sla c
  13+ AFEE 17               rla
  14+ AFEF BA               cp d
  15+ AFF0 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ AFF2 0C               inc c
  17+ AFF3 92               sub d
  18+ AFF4              LL64:
  19+ AFF4 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ AFF6 32 D6 97     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ AFF9 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ AFFA 32 D8 97     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ AFFD C9               ret
  24+ AFFE              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ AFFE 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B000 32 D8 97     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B003 32 D6 97     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B006 C9           	ret
  29+ B007
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   4+ B007 CD AF AE     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B00A 08           	ex 	af,af'

   7+ B00C 32 D9 97     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B00F 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B010 32 D8 97     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B013 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ B014 C9           	ret

  32+ B087
  33+ B087              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B087              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B087              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B087 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B088 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B089 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B08C 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B08D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B08F CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B092              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B092              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B092              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B092 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B093 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B095 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B096 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B097 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B099 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B09B              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B09B CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B09D              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B09D FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B09F DA AC B0    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B0A2 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B0A4 37           		scf
  56+ B0A5 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B0A7 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B0A9              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B0A9 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B0AA B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B0AB C9           		ret
  62+ B0AC              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B0AC B7           	or			a
  64+ B0AD CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B0AF 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B0B1 C3 A9 B0     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B0B4
  68+ B0B4              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B0B4              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B0B4
  71+ B0B4
  72+ B0B4
  73+ B0B4
  74+ B0B4              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B0B4 CD DF B1     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B0B7 32 33 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B0BA C3 F0 B0     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B0BD
  79+ B0BD              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B0BD AF           		xor		a
  81+ B0BE 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B0BF 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B0C2 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B0C4 CA B4 B0     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B0C7 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B0CA 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B0CB 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B0CE CD A5 B1     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B0D1 32 31 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B0D4 C3 F0 B0     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B0D7              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B0D7              TIDY:
  93+ B0D7 DD 01                break
  94+ B0D9              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B0D9              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B0D9 CD 15 B0     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B0DC CD BC AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B0DF CD 4E B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B0E2              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B0E2 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B0E5 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B0E7 CA BD B0     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B0EA              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B0EA CD 6B B1             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B0ED 32 2F C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B0F0              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B0F0 CD 28 B0     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B0F3 CD BC AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B0F6              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B0F6 CD 61 B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B0F9 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B0FC 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B0FF 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B102 CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B105 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B108 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B109 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B10C CD 87 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B10F                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B10F A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B110 CA 15 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B113 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B115              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B115 32 29 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B118              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B118 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B11B 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B11E 3A 2F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B121 CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B124 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B127 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B128 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B12B CD 87 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B12E                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B12E A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B12F CA 34 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B132 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B134              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B134 32 37 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B137              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B137 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B13A 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B13D 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B140 CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B143 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B146 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B147 3A 2F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B14A CD 87 B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B14D                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B14D A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B14E CA 53 B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B151 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B153              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B153 32 2B C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B156              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B156 21 34 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B159 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B15B AF                   xor     a
 153+ B15C              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B15C 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B15D 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B15E 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B15F 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B161 CD 3B B0     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B164 CD BC AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B167              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B167 CD 74 B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B16A
 163+ B16A C9           		ret
 164+ B16B
 165+ B16B
 166+ B16B
 167+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B16B              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B16B
 239+ B16B
 240+ B16B              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B16B              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B16B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B16B 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B16E 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B171 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B174 CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B177              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B177 3A 37 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B17A 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B17D 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B180 CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B183 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B184 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B186 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B188              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B188 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B18B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B18C E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B18E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B190 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B192 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B193 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B195 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B196 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B197 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B198 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B19A CD 2E AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B19D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B19F EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B1A1 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B1A3 B0           		or		b
 268+ B1A4 C9           		ret
 269+ B1A5
 270+ B1A5
 271+ B1A5              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B1A5              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B1A5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B1A5 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B1A8 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B1AB 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B1AE CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B1B1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B1B1 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B1B4 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B1B7 3A 2F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B1BA CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B1BD 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B1BE E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B1C0 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B1C2 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B1C5 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B1C6 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B1C8 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B1CA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B1CC 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B1CD E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B1CF 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B1D0 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B1D1 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B1D2 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B1D4 CD 2E AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B1D7 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B1D9 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B1DB E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B1DD B0           		or		b
 298+ B1DE C9           		ret
 299+ B1DF
 300+ B1DF              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B1DF              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B1DF              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B1DF 3A 37 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B1E2 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B1E5 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B1E8 CD 07 B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B1EB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B1EB 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B1EE 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B1F1 3A 2F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B1F4 CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B1F7 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B1F8 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B1FA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B1FC 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B1FF 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B200 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B202 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B204 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B206 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B207 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B209 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B20A 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B20B 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B20C 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B20E CD 2E AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B211 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B213 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B215 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B217 B0           		or		b
 327+ B218 C9           		ret
 328+ B219
 329+ B219
 330+ B219
 331+ B219              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B219              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B219              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B219              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B219              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B219              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B219              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B219              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B219              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B219              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B219              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B219              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B219              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B219              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B219              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B219              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B219              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B219              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B219              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B219              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B219              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B219              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B219              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B219              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B219              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B219              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B219
 377+ B219
 378+ B219
 379+ B219
 380+ B219
 381+ B219
 382+ B219              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B219              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B219              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:

 392+ B219              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof

1079  B219                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B219
   2+ B219              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B219 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B21A D2 38 B2    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B21D 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B21F CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B221 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B223                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B223 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B224 DA 29 B2    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B227 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B228                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B228 B7          >                        or a
   9+ B229 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B22A CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B22C 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B22E 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B22F C9                                   ret
  14+ B230 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B231 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B232 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B234 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B236 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B237 C9                                   ret
  20+ B238 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B23A C9                                   ret
  22+ B23B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1080  B23B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B23B              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B23B              TIS1:
   3+ B23B 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B23C 3A BD 96     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B23F 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B240 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B241              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B241 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B242 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B243 32 D7 97     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B246 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B247 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B249 CD AF A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B24C              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B24C              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B24C              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B24C 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B24D E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B24F 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B250 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B251 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B253 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B255 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B256              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B256 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B258 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B25A 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B25C DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B25E              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B25E CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B260 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B262 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B263 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B264 C9           		ret
  35+ B265
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

1089  B265                  INCLUDE "./Drive/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Drive/drive_access.asm
   1+ B265              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ B265              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ B265              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ B265              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ B265              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ B265              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ B265
   8+ B265              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ B265              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ B265              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ B265
  12+ B265 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ B269 DD E5
  13+ B26B AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ B26C CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ B26D 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ B26E 32 78 B2                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ B271 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ B275 C1 F1
  18+ B277 C9                                   ret
  19+ B278 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ B279
  21+ B279              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ B279              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ B279              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ B279              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ B279              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ B279              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ B279 E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ B27C DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ B27E 3A 78 B2                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ B281 CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ B282 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ B283 DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ B286 C9                                   ret
  34+ B287
  35+ B287              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ B287              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ B287              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ B287              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ B287              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ B287              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ B287 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ B288 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ B289 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ B28C E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ B28D CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ B28E 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ B28F E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ B290 C9                                   ret
  49+ B291
  50+ B291              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ B291              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ B291              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ B291              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ B291              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ B291              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ B291 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ B292 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ B293 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ B296 E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ B297 CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ B298 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ B299 E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ B29A C9                                   ret
  64+ B29B
  65+ B29B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ B29B              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ B29B              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ B29B              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ B29B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ B29B B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ B29C C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ B29D CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ B29E 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ B29F C9                                   ret
  75+ B2A0
  76+ B2A0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ B2A0              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ B2A0              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ B2A0              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ B2A0              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ B2A0              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ B2A0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ B2A0 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ B2A3 CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ B2A4 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ B2A5 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ B2A8 C9                                   ret
  88+ B2A9
  89+ B2A9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ B2A9              ; Init the file system
  91+ B2A9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ B2A9 CD 65 B2     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ B2AC C9                                   ret
  94+ B2AD
  95+ B2AD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ B2AD              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ B2AD              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ B2AD              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ B2AD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ B2AD CD 65 B2     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ B2B0 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ B2B3                                      ; get file size
 103+ B2B3 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ B2B4 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ B2B5 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ B2B6 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ B2B7 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ B2BA E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ B2BB DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ B2BD 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ B2BF CD 79 B2                             call    fOpen
 112+ B2C2 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ B2C4 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ B2C6 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ B2C8 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ B2CB F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ B2CC CD 87 B2                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ B2CF 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ B2D1 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ B2D2 CD 9B B2                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ B2D5 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ B2D7 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ B2DA C9                                   ret
 124+ B2DB              ;
 125+ B2DB              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ B2DB              ;
 127+ B2DB DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ B2DD C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ B2DE
 130+ B2DE              .error_closing:
 131+ B2DE C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ B2DF D1                                   pop	de
 133+ B2E0 C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ B2E1 C9                                   ret
 135+ B2E2
 136+ B2E2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ B2E2              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ B2E2              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ B2E2              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ B2E2              ;		bc = size
 141+ B2E2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ B2E2 CD 65 B2     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ B2E5 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ B2E7 E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ B2E8 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ B2EA 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ B2EC CD 79 B2                             call    fOpen
 148+ B2EF 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ B2F1 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ B2F3 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ B2F5 DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ B2F7 C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ B2F8 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ B2F9 CD 91 B2                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ B2FC 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ B2FE F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ B2FF CD 9B B2                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ B302 C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ B303              ;
 160+ B303              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ B303              ;
 162+ B303 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ B305 C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ B306 C9                                   ret
 165+ B307
# file closed: ./Drive/drive_access.asm

  18+ B3B4
  19+ B3B4              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ B3B4              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ B3B4              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ B3B4 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ B3B5 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ B3B6 23           	inc			hl
  25+ B3B7 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ B3B8 23           	inc			hl
  27+ B3B9 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ B3BA 23           	inc			hl
  29+ B3BB 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B3BC 23           	inc			hl
  31+ B3BD E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B3BE EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ B3BF 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ B3C1                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ B3C1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ B3C5 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ B3C8 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ B3C9 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ B3CA 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B3CC C9           	ret
  40+ B3CD
  41+ B3CD
  42+ B3CD              print_boiler_text:
  43+ B3CD              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B3CD              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B3CD C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ B3CE 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ B3CF 23           	inc			hl
  48+ B3D0 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ B3D1 23           	inc			hl
  50+ B3D2 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ B3D3 23           	inc			hl
  52+ B3D4 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B3D5 23           	inc			hl
  54+ B3D6 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B3D7 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ B3D8 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ B3DA C5           	push		bc
  58+ B3DB D1           	pop			de
  59+ B3DC CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ B3DF E1           	pop			hl

  72+ B41F FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal

  32+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C0C2 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C0C3 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C0C4 23           	inc			hl
   7++C0C5 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C0C6 23           	inc			hl
   9++C0C7 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C0C8 23           	inc			hl
  11++C0C9 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C0CA 23           	inc			hl
  13++C0CB E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C0CC EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C0CD 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C0CF C5           	push		bc
  17++C0D0 D1           	pop			de
  18++C0D1                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0D5 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0D8 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0D9 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0DA 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0DC C9           	ret
  24++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height

 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)

 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)

 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)

 380+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x

 458+ C479              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 459+ C479 3A CD 98     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 460+ C47C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,src_BoundsLimit
 460+ C47C FE 01       >                        cp     1
 460+ C47E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 461+ C481 3D                                   dec     a
 462+ C482 32 CD 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 463+ C485 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 464+ C488 C9                                   ret
 465+ C489              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 466+ C489 3A CD 98     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 467+ C48C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 467+ C48C FE FF       >                        cp     255
 467+ C48E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 468+ C491 3C                                   inc    a
 469+ C492 32 CD 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 470+ C495 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 471+ C498 C9                                   ret
 472+ C499              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 473+ C499 3A CC 98     src_LeftPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 474+ C49C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,src_BoundsLimit
 474+ C49C FE 02       >                        cp     2
 474+ C49E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C4A1 3D                                   dec    a
 476+ C4A2 32 CC 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a

 478+ C4A8 C9                                   ret
 479+ C4A9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 480+ C4A9 3A CC 98     src_RightPressed:       ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 481+ C4AC                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,src_BoundsLimit
 481+ C4AC FE FD       >                        cp     253
 481+ C4AE CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4B1 3C                                   inc    a
 483+ C4B2 32 CC 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a

 485+ C4B8 C9                                   ret

 490+ C4C2 C9                                   ret

  24+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  25+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  26+ C0A9              GCM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:

  61+ C0E4 3A B7 98         ld      a,(Galaxy)
  62+ C0E7                  MMUSelectGalaxyA
  62+ C0E7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a

  64+ C0EC E1               pop     hl

  66+ C0F0 CD 7A 9C     	call    copy_seed
  67+ C0F3 3A C6 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed w1_h is Xcoord of star
  68+ C0F6 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = X Coord
  69+ C0F7 3A C4 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  70+ C0FA CB 3F        	srl		a								; Ycoord /2
  71+ C0FC C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset		; add offset to Y coord of star
  72+ C0FE 47           	ld		b,a								; b = row
  73+ C0FF C5           	push	bc
  74+ C100 3E D8        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour
  75+ C102                  MMUSelectLayer2
  75+ C102 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  76+ C106 CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  77+ C109 C1           	pop		bc
  78+ C10A 3A C7 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  79+ C10D F6 50        	or		$50								; minimum distance away
  80+ C10F FE 90        	cp		$90
  81+ C111 30 0A        	jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel
  82+ C113              .SecondPixel:
  83+ C113 0C           	inc		c
  84+ C114 3E 6C        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  85+ C116                  MMUSelectLayer2
  85+ C116 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  86+ C11A CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  87+ C11D              .NoSecondPixel:
  88+ C11D DD E5            push    ix
  89+ C11F E1               pop     hl
  90+ C120 ED 34 08 00      add     hl,8
  91+ C124 E5               push    hl
  92+ C125 DD E1            pop     ix
  93+ C127 3A DC 97     	ld		a,(XSAV)
  94+ C12A 3D           	dec		a
  95+ C12B FE 00        	cp		0
  96+ C12D C8           	ret		z
  97+ C12E 32 DC 97     	ld		(XSAV),a
  98+ C131 18 B1        	jr		.CounterLoop

 162+ C218              gc_display_find_string:

 166+ C221 ED A0            ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 167+ C223 3A 86 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 168+ C226 3C               inc     a
 169+ C227 47               ld      b,a
 170+ C228 3E 14            ld      a,20
 171+ C22A 90               sub     b
 172+ C22B 47               ld      b,a
 173+ C22C 3E 20            ld      a," "
 174+ C22E              .SpacePad

 176+ C22F 13               inc     de

 178+ C232 AF               xor     a

 184+ C241 C9               ret

 186+ C242              blink_cursor:
 187+ C242 3A B9 C1         ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 188+ C245 3D               dec     a
 189+ C246 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 190+ C249 C0               ret     nz
 191+ C24A              .FlashCursor:
 192+ C24A 3E 10            ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 193+ C24C 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 194+ C24F 3A BA C1         ld      a,(gcCursorChar)
 195+ C252 FE 20            cp      " "
 196+ C254 28 06            jr      z,.ChangeToStar
 197+ C256 3E 20            ld      a," "
 198+ C258 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 199+ C25B C9               ret
 200+ C25C              .ChangeToStar:
 201+ C25C 3E 2A            ld      a,"*"
 202+ C25E 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 203+ C261 C9               ret
 204+ C262              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 205+ C262 3A B8 C1     loop_gc_menu:           ld      a,(gcFindInputMode)
 206+ C265 FE 00                                cp      0
 207+ C267 20 1C                                jr      nz,AlreadyInInputMode
 208+ C269 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 209+ C26B CD 19 95                             call    is_key_pressed
 210+ C26E C0                                   ret     nz
 211+ C26F CD 9C 95                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 212+ C272 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 213+ C274 32 B8 C1                             ld      (gcFindInputMode),a                     ; Set input mode to FF
 214+ C277 3E 10                                ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 215+ C279 32 B9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a                       ; Set up Blink
 216+ C27C 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 217+ C27E 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a                         ; And keyboard rescan delay
 218+ C281 CD 0A C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text
 219+ C284 C9                                   ret
 220+ C285              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 221+ C285 3A DB C1     AlreadyInInputMode:     ld      a,(gcInputDelay)                    ; keyboard next press delay
 222+ C288 FE 00                                cp      0                                   ; can no read until its zero
 223+ C28A 20 17                                jr      nz,.blinkCursor                     ; so re just go to blink cursor routine if not permitted
 224+ C28C CD B0 95     .HasKeyBeenPressed:     call    InputName                           ; else we are ready to read input

 226+ C292 47                                   ld      b,a
 227+ C293 FE 00                                cp      0
 228+ C295 28 13                                jr      z,.blinkNoDelay                     ; when we go hear the input delay could be zero a flip over
 229+ C297 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 230+ C299 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a
 231+ C29C 3A 87 95     .WasItEnter:            ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 232+ C29F FE 00                                cp      0
 233+ C2A1 20 1A                                jr      nz,.FindEnterPressed

 236+ C2A7 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a

 238+ C2AD 3A B9 C1                             ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 239+ C2B0 FE 10                                cp      gcBlinkVal
 240+ C2B2 CC 18 C2                             call    z,gc_display_find_string
 241+ C2B5 C9                                   ret
 242+ C2B6 78           .FindDone:              ld      a,b
 243+ C2B7 FE 00                                cp      0
 244+ C2B9 C4 18 C2                             call    nz,gc_display_find_string
 245+ C2BC C9                                   ret
 246+ C2BD AF           .FindEnterPressed:      xor     a

 250+ C2C7                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 255+ C2D6 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                 ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 256+ C2D8 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch

 258+ C2DD 4F                                   ld      c,a

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  12++C147              .Num2:
  13++C147 04           	inc		b
  14++C148 81           	add		a,c
  15++C149 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++C14B 91           	sub 	c
  17++C14C C5           	push	bc
  18++C14D F5           	push	af
  19++C14E 79           	ld		a,c
  20++C14F FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++C151 CC 5A C1     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++C154 78           	ld		a,b
  23++C155 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++C156 13           	inc		de
  25++C157 F1           	pop		af
  26++C158 C1           	pop		bc
  27++C159 C9           	ret

  31++C15D 13           	inc		de

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C2C5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C2C6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C2C7 23           	inc			hl
   7++C2C8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C2C9 23           	inc			hl
   9++C2CA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C2CB 23           	inc			hl
  11++C2CC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C2CD 23           	inc			hl
  13++C2CE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C2CF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C2D0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C2D2 C5           	push		bc
  17++C2D3 D1           	pop			de
  18++C2D4                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C2D8 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C2DB E1           	pop			hl
  21++C2DC C1           	pop			bc
  22++C2DD 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C2DF C9           	ret
