 575+ D11B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++D11B              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++D11B 2A 88 C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++D11E 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++D11F E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++D121 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++D122                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++D122 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++D123 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++D125 67                   ld      h,a
  10++D126                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++D126 ED 5B 0C C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++D12A 3A 0E C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++D12D E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++D12F 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++D130 CD BB AD     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++D133 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++D134 67           		ld		h,a
  18++D135 22 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++D138              ; ..................................
  20++D138 2A 8A C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++D13B 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++D13C E6 80        		and		$80
  23++D13E 47           		ld		b,a
  24++D13F                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++D13F 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++D140 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++D142 67                   ld      h,a
  28++D143                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++D143 ED 5B 0F C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++D147 3A 11 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++D14A E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++D14C 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++D14D CD BB AD     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++D150 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++D151 67           		ld		h,a
  36++D152 22 84 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++D155              ; ..................................
  38++D155 2A 8C C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++D158 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++D159 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++D15B 47           		ld		b,a
  42++D15C                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++D15C 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++D15D E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++D15F 67                   ld      h,a
  46++D160                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++D160 ED 5B 12 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D164 3A 14 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++D167 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++D169 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++D16A CD BB AD     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++D16D B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++D16E 67           		ld		h,a
  54++D16F CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++D171 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++D173 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++D175 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++D177 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++D178              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++D178 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++D17A DA 89 D1    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++D17D              NoClampZto4:
  61++D17D 22 86 C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++D180 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++D181 32 F4 97             ld      (varT),a
  64++D184 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++D185 32 D6 97             ld      (varU),a
  66++D188 C9           		ret
  67++D189              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++D189 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++D18C 22 86 C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++D18F 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++D190 32 F4 97             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++D193 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++D194 32 D6 97             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++D197 C9           		ret
  75++D198
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 576+ D198                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++D198              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++D198 ED 4B 86 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++D19C 2A 82 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++D19F ED 5B 84 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++D1A3              SetABSbc:
   6++D1A3 78           	ld			a,b
   7++D1A4 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++D1A6 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++D1A8 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++D1A9              SetABShl:
  11++D1A9 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++D1AA DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++D1AC E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++D1AE 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++D1AF              SetABSde:
  16++D1AF 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++D1B0 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++D1B2 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++D1B4 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++D1B5              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++D1B5 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++D1B6 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++D1B7 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++D1B8 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++D1BA                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++D1BA CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++D1BC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++D1BE                  ShiftDERight1
  26++D1BE CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++D1C0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++D1C2              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++D1C2 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++D1C4 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++D1C6 C3 B5 D1         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++D1C9              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++D1C9 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++D1CB E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++D1CD B0           	or			b
  33++D1CE 47           	ld			b,a
  34++D1CF              SignforHL:
  35++D1CF DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++D1D1 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++D1D3 B4           	or			h
  38++D1D4 67           	ld			h,a
  39++D1D5              SignforDE:
  40++D1D5 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++D1D7 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++D1D9 B2           	or			d
  43++D1DA 57           	ld			d,a
  44++D1DB              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++D1DB ED 43 86 C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++D1DF 22 82 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++D1E2 ED 53 84 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++D1E6 78           	ld			a,b
  49++D1E7 32 D6 97     	ld			(varU),a
  50++D1EA 79           	ld			a,c
  51++D1EB 32 F4 97     	ld			(varT),a
  52++D1EE C9           	ret
  53++D1EF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 591+ D200 3A 17 C3     SetAllFacesVisible:     ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+FaceCtX4Addr                                 ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 592+ D203 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 593+ D205 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 594+ D207 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 595+ D208 21 AF C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 596+ D20B 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF

 602+ D212              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 603+ D212 3A 17 C3     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 604+ D215 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 605+ D217 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 606+ D219 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 607+ D21A 06 10                                ld      b,16
 608+ D21C 21 AF C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 609+ D21F 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 610+ D221 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 611+ D222 23                                   inc     hl
 612+ D223 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop

 614+ D226
 615+ D226              ;;;;X = normal scale
 616+ D226              ;;;;ZtempHi = zhi
 617+ D226              ;;;;......................................................
 618+ D226              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 619+ D226              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90
 620+ D226              ;;;;     inc X
 621+ D226              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2
 622+ D226              ;;;;  Until ZtempHi = 0
 623+ D226              ;;;;......................................................
 624+ D226              ;-LL21---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 625+ D226                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++D226              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++D226              Norm256mulAdivQ:
   3++D226 47               ld      b,a
   4++D227 0E 00            ld      c,0
   5++D229 16 00            ld      d,0
   6++D22B 3A D7 97         ld      a,(varQ)
   7++D22E 5F               ld      e,a
   8++D22F              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   9++D22F              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  10++D22F              NormDIV16UNDOC:
  11++D22F 21 00 00         ld      hl,0
  12++D232 78               ld      a,b
  13++D233 06 10            ld      b,16
  14++D235              NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:
  15++D235 CB 31        	sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  16++D237 17           	rla	    		; ...
  17++D238 ED 6A        	adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  18++D23A ED 52        	sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  19++D23C 30 02        	jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  20++D23E 19           	add	    hl,de		; ...
  21++D23F 0D           	dec	    c		; ...
  22++D240              NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:
  23++D240 10 F3            djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  24++D242 79               ld      a,c
  25++D243 32 D8 97         ld      (varR),a
  26++D246 C9               ret
  27++D247
  28++D247              ; Tested OK
  29++D247              NormaliseTransMat:
  30++D247              ;LL21
  31++D247 21 4E C0             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  32++D24A 0E C5                ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  33++D24C 79                   ld      a,c
  34++D24D 32 D7 97             ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  35++D250 06 09                ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  36++D252              LL21Loop:
  37++D252 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  38++D253 2B                   dec     hl
  39++D254 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  40++D255                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  40++D255 CB 23       >			   sla e
  40++D257 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  41++D259 7A                   ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  42++D25A E5           		push	hl
  43++D25B C5           		push	bc
  44++D25C CD 26 D2             call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  45++D25F              		;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  46++D25F 79                   ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  47++D260 C1           		pop		bc
  48++D261 E1           		pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  49++D262 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  50++D263 2B                   dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  51++D264 10 EC                djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  52++D266 C9                   ret
  53++D267
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 626+ D267              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 627+ D267
 628+ D267              ; Now we have
 629+ D267              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 630+ D267              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 631+ D267              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 632+ D267              ;
 633+ D267              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 634+ D267                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++D267              ; TESTEDOK
   2++D267
   3++D267              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++D267              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++D267              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++D267              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++D267              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++D267              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++D267              ;ScaleNode:
  10++D267              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++D267              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++D267              ;        sla      a
  13++D267              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++D267              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++D267              ;        inc     hl

  17++D267              ;        dec     ixh
  18++D267              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode

  20++D267
  21++D267
  22++D267              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++D267              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++D267              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++D267              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++D267              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++D267              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++D267              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++D267              ; OUTPUT
  30++D267              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++D267              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++D267              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++D267              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++D267 2A 3D C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++D26A ED 5B 43 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++D26E ED 4B 49 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++D272 22 55 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++D275 ED 53 57 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++D279 ED 43 59 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++D27D 2A 3F C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++D280 ED 5B 45 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++D284 ED 4B 4B C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++D288 22 5D C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++D28B ED 53 5F C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++D28F ED 43 61 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++D293 2A 41 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++D296 ED 5B 47 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++D29A ED 4B 4D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++D29E 22 65 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++D2A1 ED 53 67 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++D2A5 ED 43 69 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++D2A9 C9                   ret
  53++D2AA
  54++D2AA
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 635+ D2AA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 636+ D2AA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 637+ D2AA              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 638+ D2AA              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 639+ D2AA              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 640+ D2AA              ; Returns
 641+ D2AA              ;
 642+ D2AA              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 643+ D2AA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 644+ D2AA              ;
 645+ D2AA              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 646+ D2AA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 647+ D2AA              ;
 648+ D2AA              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 649+ D2AA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 650+ D2AA              XXCURRENTN0equN1byN2div256: MACRO param1, param2, param3
 651+ D2AA ~                                    ld      c,0
 652+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,param3                      ;
 653+ D2AA ~                                    bit     7,a
 654+ D2AA ~                                    jr      z,.val2Pos
 655+ D2AA ~            ;HandleSignebits
 656+ D2AA ~                                    neg
 657+ D2AA ~                                    ld      c,$80
 658+ D2AA ~            .val2Pos:               ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 659+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,param2                        ; A = XX16 element
 660+ D2AA ~                                    bit     7,a
 661+ D2AA ~                                    jr      z,.val1Pos
 662+ D2AA ~            ;HandleSignebits
 663+ D2AA ~                                    neg
 664+ D2AA ~                                    ld      b,a
 665+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,c
 666+ D2AA ~                                    xor     $80
 667+ D2AA ~                                    ld      c,a
 668+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,b
 669+ D2AA ~            .val1Pos:               ld      d,a
 670+ D2AA ~            ;AequAmulQdiv256:
 671+ D2AA ~                                    mul
 672+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,c
 673+ D2AA ~                                    bit     7,a
 674+ D2AA ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 675+ D2AA ~                                    jr      z,.resultPos
 676+ D2AA ~                                    neg
 677+ D2AA ~            .resultPos:             ld      (param1),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 678+ D2AA                                      ENDM
 679+ D2AA
 680+ D2AA
 681+ D2AA               ; TESTEDOK
 682+ D2AA              XX12DotOneRow:
 683+ D2AA              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 683+ D2AA 3A 82 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 683+ D2AD 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 683+ D2AE 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 683+ D2AF 57          >                        ld      d,a
 683+ D2B0 ED 30       >                        mul
 683+ D2B2 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 683+ D2B3 32 F4 97    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 684+ D2B6 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 685+ D2B7              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 685+ D2B7 3A 83 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 685+ D2BA AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 686+ D2BB 32 D9 97                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 687+ D2BE 23                                   inc     hl
 688+ D2BF              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 688+ D2BF 3A 84 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 688+ D2C2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 688+ D2C3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 688+ D2C4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 688+ D2C5 ED 30       >                        mul
 688+ D2C7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 688+ D2C8 32 D7 97    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 689+ D2CB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 689+ D2CB 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 689+ D2CE 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 690+ D2D1 23                                   inc     hl
 691+ D2D2                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 691+ D2D2 3A 85 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 691+ D2D5 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 692+ D2D6              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 693+ D2D6 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 694+ D2D7 CD D9 AE                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 695+ D2DA E1                                   pop     hl
 696+ D2DB 32 F4 97                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 697+ D2DE 23                                   inc     hl
 698+ D2DF              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 698+ D2DF 3A 86 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 698+ D2E2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 698+ D2E3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 698+ D2E4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 698+ D2E5 ED 30       >                        mul
 698+ D2E7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 698+ D2E8 32 D7 97    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 699+ D2EB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 699+ D2EB 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 699+ D2EE 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 700+ D2F1 23                                   inc     hl
 701+ D2F2                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 701+ D2F2 3A 87 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 701+ D2F5 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 702+ D2F6              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 703+ D2F6 CD D9 AE                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 704+ D2F9              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 705+ D2F9 C9                                   ret
 706+ D2FA
 707+ D2FA
 708+ D2FA              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 709+ D2FA              ;TESTED OK
 710+ D2FA              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 711+ D2FA              XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 712+ D2FA 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 713+ D2FD 21 3D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 714+ D300 CD AA D2                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 715+ D303 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 716+ D306 3A D9 97                             ld      a,(varS)
 717+ D309 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 718+ D30C 21 43 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 719+ D30F CD AA D2                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 720+ D312 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 721+ D315 3A D9 97                             ld      a,(varS)
 722+ D318 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 723+ D31B 21 49 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 724+ D31E CD AA D2                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 725+ D321 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 726+ D324 3A D9 97                             ld      a,(varS)
 727+ D327 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 728+ D32A C9                                   ret
 729+ D32B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 730+ D32B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++D32B              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++D32B              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++D32B                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++D32B 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12)
   3++D32E 32 76 C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a
   4++D331                      ldCopyByte XX12+1       ,XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++D331 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+1)
   4++D334 32 78 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+2),a
   5++D337                      ldCopyByte XX12+2       ,XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++D337 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   5++D33A 32 79 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+3),a
   6++D33D                      ldCopyByte XX12+3       ,XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++D33D 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++D340 32 7B C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++D343                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev

 731+ D350                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12toXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12toXX15.asm
   1++D350              CopyXX12toXX15:         ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo     ,UBnkXScaled        ; xlo
   1++D350 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
   1++D353 32 82 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   2++D356                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign   ,UBnkXScaledSign    ; xsg
   2++D356 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
   2++D359 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
   3++D35C                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo     ,UBnkYScaled        ; xlo
   3++D35C 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
   3++D35F 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   4++D362                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign   ,UBnkYScaledSign    ; xsg
   4++D362 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
   4++D365 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
   5++D368                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo     ,UBnkZScaled        ; xlo
   5++D368 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
   5++D36B 32 86 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a

  45++D41F              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  46++D41F              LL94Z:
  47++D41F 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  48++D421 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  49++D423 3A 86 C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  50++D426 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  51++D427 3A 87 C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  52++D42A 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  53++D42B 3A 7C C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  54++D42E 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;

  56++D432 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  57++D433 CD BB AD             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  58++D436 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  59++D437 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  60++D438 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ

 734+ D483                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D483              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D483              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D483                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D483 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D486 32 82 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D489                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D489 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D48C 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D48F                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal

 735+ D496              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 736+ D496                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D496              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D496              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D496              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D496              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D496              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D496              ;;; R = T
   7++D496              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D496              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D496              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D496              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D496              ;;; R = T
  12++D496              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D496
  14++D496
  15++D496
  16++D496
  17++D496
  18++D496              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D496 ~            						mul
  20++D496 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D496              						ENDM
  22++D496              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D496 3A 88 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D499                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D499 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D49A CA B7 D4    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  25++D49D 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D49E 3A 82 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D4A1 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D4A2                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D4A2 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D4A3 CA B7 D4    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  29++D4A6 ED 30        		mul
  30++D4A8 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D4A9 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D4AC 21 83 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D4AF AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D4B0 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D4B2 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D4B4 C3 BB D4             jp          dotmuly
  37++D4B7              dotxskipzero:
  38++D4B7 AF                   xor         a
  39++D4B8 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D4B9 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D4BB              dotmuly:
  42++D4BB              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D4BB 3A 8A C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D4BE                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D4BE A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D4BF CA DE D4    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  45++D4C2 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D4C3 3A 84 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D4C6                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D4C6 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D4C7 CA DE D4    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  48++D4CA 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D4CB ED 30                mul
  50++D4CD 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D4CE DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D4D0 3A 8B C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D4D3 21 85 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D4D6 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D4D7 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D4D9 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D4DB C3 E2 D4             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D4DE              dotyskipzero:
  59++D4DE AF                   xor         a
  60++D4DF 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D4E0 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D4E2              dotaddxy:
  63++D4E2              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D4E2 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D4E4 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D4E5 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D4E7 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D4E8 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D4EA 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D4EB CD BB AD             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D4EE 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D4EF 3A 8C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D4F2                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D4F2 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D4F3 CA 18 D5    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  74++D4F6 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D4F7 3A 86 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D4FA                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D4FA A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D4FB CA 18 D5    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  77++D4FE 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D4FF ED 30                mul
  79++D501 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D502 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D505 21 8D C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D508 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D509 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D50B 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D50C E1                   pop         hl
  86++D50D 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D50E 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D510 CD BB AD             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D513 32 D9 97             ld          (varS),a
  90++D516 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D517 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D518              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D518 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D519 32 D9 97             ld          (varS),a
  95++D51C 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D51D C9                   ret
  97++D51E              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D51E              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D51E              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D51E              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D51E              ;;;;		mul
 104++D51E              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D51E              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D51E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D51E              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D51E              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D51E              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D51E              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D51E              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D51E              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D51E              ;;;;       mul
 117++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D51E              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D51E              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D51E              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D51E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D51E              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D51E              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D51E              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D51E              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D51E              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D51E              ;;;;       mul
 132++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D51E              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D51E              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D51E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D51E              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D51E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D51E              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D51E              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D51E              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D51E
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 737+ D51E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 738+ D51E              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 739+ D51E                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D51E              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D51E              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D51E              ScaleNormal:
   4++D51E              LL93:
   5++D51E 3A DE 97             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D521 DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D523 3A 86 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D526 DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D528 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D529              ScaleLoop:
  11++D529              LL933:
  12++D529 21 82 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D52C CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D52E 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D52F 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D530 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D532 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D533 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D534 CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D536 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D537 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D539 F2 29 D5             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D53C C9                   ret
  24++D53D
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 740+ D53D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 741+ D53D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D53D              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D53D              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D53D 3A 1D C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D540 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D541              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D541 3A 7D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D544 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D545                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D545 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D546 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D547              LL90Loop:
  10++D547              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D547 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D548                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D548 2A 79 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D54B CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D54D CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D54F 22 79 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D552                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D552 2A 76 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D555 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D557 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D559 22 76 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D55C                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D55C 2A 7C C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D55F CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D561 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D563 22 7C C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D566 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D567                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D567 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  16++D569 C2 47 D5    >                        jp	nz,LL90Loop
  17++D56C C9                   ret
  18++D56D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 742+ D56D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 743+ D56D
 744+ D56D              ; Backface cull
 745+ D56D              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 746+ D56D              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates

 749+ D56D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D56D 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D56E 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D56F E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D571 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D574 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D575 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D577 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D578 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D57A 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D57D 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D57E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D580 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D582 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D585 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D586 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D587 32 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D58A 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D58B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D58C 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D58F 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D590 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D591 32 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D594 C9                                   ret
  24++D595

 750+ D595                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D595 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D596 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D597 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D599 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D59C 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D59D CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D59F 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D5A0 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D5A2 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D5A5 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D5A6 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D5A8 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D5AA 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D5AD 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D5AE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D5AF 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;

  19++D5B4 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;

  22++D5B9 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D5BC C9                                   ret
  24++D5BD
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 751+ D5BD              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 752+ D5BD              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 753+ D5BD              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 754+ D5BD              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 755+ D5BD              ; return if no faces
 756+ D5BD              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 757+ D5BD              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 758+ D5BD              ; While Z hi <> 0
 759+ D5BD              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 760+ D5BD              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 761+ D5BD              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 762+ D5BD              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 763+ D5BD              ; Loop
 764+ D5BD              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 765+ D5BD              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 766+ D5BD              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 767+ D5BD              ; For each face
 768+ D5BD              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 769+ D5BD              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 770+ D5BD              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 771+ D5BD              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 772+ D5BD              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 773+ D5BD              ;        else
 774+ D5BD              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 775+ D5BD              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 776+ D5BD              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 777+ D5BD              ;           While X >= 0
 778+ D5BD              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 779+ D5BD              ;              if  x >= 0
 780+ D5BD              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 781+ D5BD              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 782+ D5BD              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 783+ D5BD              ;           loop
 784+ D5BD              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 785+ D5BD              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 786+ D5BD              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 787+ D5BD              ;               X = 1
 788+ D5BD              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 789+ D5BD              ;           else
 790+ D5BD              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 791+ D5BD              ;           endif
 792+ D5BD              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 793+ D5BD              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 794+ D5BD              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 795+ D5BD              ;               X = 1
 796+ D5BD              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 797+ D5BD              ;           else
 798+ D5BD              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 799+ D5BD              ;           endif
 800+ D5BD              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 801+ D5BD              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 802+ D5BD              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 803+ D5BD              ;               X = 1
 804+ D5BD              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 805+ D5BD              ;           else
 806+ D5BD              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 807+ D5BD              ;           endif
 808+ D5BD              ;        endif
 809+ D5BD              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 810+ D5BD              ;        if dot product < 0
 811+ D5BD              ;           set face visible
 812+ D5BD              ;        else
 813+ D5BD              ;           set face invisible
 814+ D5BD              ;        end if
 815+ D5BD              ;     else
 816+ D5BD              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 817+ D5BD              ;     end if
 818+ D5BD              ; Next Face
 819+ D5BD
 820+ D5BD DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 821+ D5BF F8                                   ret     m
 822+ D5C0 21 82 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 823+ D5C3 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 824+ D5C5 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 825+ D5C6 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 826+ D5C7 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 827+ D5C9 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 828+ D5CA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 829+ D5CB CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 830+ D5CD C3 BD D5                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
 831+ D5D0 C9                                   ret
 832+ D5D1
 833+ D5D1 21 76 C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
 834+ D5D4 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 835+ D5D6 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 836+ D5D7 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 837+ D5D8 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 838+ D5DA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
 839+ D5DB 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 840+ D5DC CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 841+ D5DE C9                                   ret
 842+ D5DF
 843+ D5DF              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 844+ D5DF
 845+ D5DF              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 846+ D5DF              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 847+ D5DF              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 848+ D5DF              ;
 849+ D5DF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 850+ D5DF              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 851+ D5DF              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 852+ D5DF              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 853+ D5DF              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 854+ D5DF
 855+ D5DF              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
 856+ D5DF 21 3D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 857+ D5E2 CD BB 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 858+ D5E5 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 859+ D5E6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 860+ D5E7 B0                                   or      b
 861+ D5E8 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 862+ D5EB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 863+ D5EC 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 864+ D5EF
 865+ D5EF 21 43 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 866+ D5F2 CD BB 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 867+ D5F5 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 868+ D5F6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 869+ D5F7 B0                                   or      b
 870+ D5F8 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 871+ D5FB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 872+ D5FC 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 873+ D5FF
 874+ D5FF 21 49 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 875+ D602 CD BB 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 876+ D605 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 877+ D606 7D                                   ld      a,l
 878+ D607 B0                                   or      b
 879+ D608 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 880+ D60B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 881+ D60C 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 882+ D60F C9                                   ret
 883+ D610
 884+ D610                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D610 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D611              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D611              ; EE29:
   4++D611
   5++D611              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D611              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D611              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D611              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D611              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D611              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D611              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D611              ;
  13++D611              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D611              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D611              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D611              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D611              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D611              ;
  19++D611              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D611              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D611              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D611              ;
  23++D611              ; so
  24++D611              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D611              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D611              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D611              ;
  28++D611              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D611              ;
  30++D611              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D611              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D611              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D611              ;
  34++D611
  35++D611
  36++D611
  37++D611 3A 7D C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D614                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D614 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D615 CA 42 D6    >                        jp	z, .ScaleDone
  39++D618 2A 76 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D61B ED 5B 79 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D61F ED 4B 7C C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D623 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D625                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D625 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D627 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D629                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D629 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D62B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D62D                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D62D CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D62F CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D631 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D632                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D632 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  47++D634 C2 23 D6    >                        jp	nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D637 22 76 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D63A ED 53 79 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D63E ED 43 7C C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D642 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D644 32 DE 97                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D647 C9                                   ret
  54++D648
  55++D648              ;;--BackFaceCull:
  56++D648              ;;--;debug:jp debug
  57++D648              ;;--; DEBUG  force for now
  58++D648              ;;--;                        ld     a,MaxVisibility                 ; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  59++D648              ;;--;                        ld     (LastNormalVisible),a           ; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  60++D648              ;;--;
  61++D648              ;;--; DEBUG
  62++D648              ;;--                         ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4 &  return if no faces
  63++D648              ;;--                       ; break
  64++D648              ;;--                        call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
  65++D648              ;;--                        call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
  66++D648              ;;--                        call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  67++D648              ;;--                        call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
  68++D648              ;;--
  69++D648              ;;--.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
  70++D648              ;;--                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
  71++D648              ;;--; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
  72++D648              ;;--                        call    ScaleDrawcam
  73++D648              ;;--                        call    CopyDrawCamToScaled
  74++D648              ;;--.LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation  ; xx12 = xx15 . XX16
  75++D648              ;;--                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = xx15.xx16
  76++D648              ;;--.PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
  77++D648              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl
  78++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
  79++D648              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  80++D648              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  81++D648              ;;--                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D648              ;;--                        xor     a
  83++D648              ;;--                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
  84++D648              ;;--ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
  85++D648              ;;--                        push    bc
  86++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
  87++D648              ;;--                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
  88++D648              ;;--                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
  89++D648              ;;--.LL86:                  jp  .LL87 ; force testing of normals
  90++D648              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible
  91++D648              ;;--; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
  92++D648              ;;--.LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12
  93++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX17)
  94++D648              ;;--                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
  95++D648              ;;--.LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15
  96++D648              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D648              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D648              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D648              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a
 100++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 101++D648              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D648              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 103++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 104++D648              ;;--                        srl     a
 105++D648              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 107++D648              ;;--.LL92:                   ld      b,a
 108++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 109++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 110++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 111++D648              ;;--.LL93                   dec     b
 112++D648              ;;--                        jp      m, .LL94
 113++D648              ;;--.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 114++D648              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 115++D648              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 116++D648              ;;--                        dec     b
 117++D648              ;;--                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 118++D648              ;;--; Add normal to XX15
 119++D648              ;;--.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 120++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 121++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 122++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+8)

 124++D648              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 125++D648              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 126++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 127++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 128++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS

 133++D648              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 134++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign

 136++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS

 141++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign

 143++D648              ;;--.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 144++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 145++D648              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256

 147++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 148++D648              ;;--                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 149++D648              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 150++D648              ;;--                        ld      (varS),a
 151++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 152++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 153++D648              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 154++D648              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a

 156++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 157++D648              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 158++D648              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 159++D648              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 160++D648              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 161++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 162++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 163++D648              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 164++D648              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 165++D648              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 166++D648              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 167++D648              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 168++D648              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 169++D648              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 170++D648              ;;--                        test    $80
 171++D648              ;;--                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 172++D648              ;;--.FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 173++D648              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 174++D648              ;;--                        jp          ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
