 176++D648              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAVisible
 177++D648              ;;--ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 178++D648              ;;--                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 179++D648              ;;--                        pop         bc
 180++D648              ;;--                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 181++D648              ;;--                        ld          a,4
 182++D648              ;;--                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry

 184++D648              ;;--                        dec         b
 185++D648              ;;--                        jp          nz,ProcessNormalsLoop

 290++D648              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256

 314++D648              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D648              ;;;;;                        test    $80

 317++D648              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D648              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D648              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if

 333++D648 00           XX4Distance             DB      0

 336++D649
 337++D649 3A 14 C0     CheckDistance:          ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 338++D64C E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 339++D64E 20 3E                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 340++D650 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 341++D653 7C                                   ld      a,h
 342++D654                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 342++D654 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 342++D656 D2 8E D6    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 343++D659 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 344++D65D CD 72 AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 345++D660 38 2C                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 346++D662 ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 347++D666 CD 72 AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 348++D669 38 23                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 349++D66B              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 349++D66B CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D66D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D66F                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D66F CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D671 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D673                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 351++D673 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 351++D675 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 352++D677 7C                                   ld      a,h
 353++D678 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 354++D67A              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 354++D67A C2 90 D6    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 355++D67D                                      ; Check visbility distance
 356++D67D              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 357++D67D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 358++D67E 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 359++D67F CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 360++D681 CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D683 CB 3F                                srl     a
 362++D685 32 48 D6                             ld      (XX4Distance),a             ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 363++D688                                      SetATrue
 363++D688 AF          >                        xor     a
 364++D689 32 9B C0                             ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a           ; set draw as dot to 0, i.e. false
 365++D68C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 365++D68C B7          >                        or a
 366++D68D C9                                   ret
 367++D68E              .ShipNoDraw:            SetCarryFlag                        ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 367++D68E 37          >                        scf
 368++D68F C9                                   ret
 369++D690              .ShipIsADot:            SetMemFalse UBnKDrawAsDot           ; use the same logic as process nodes to do 1 point
 369++D690 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 369++D692 32 9B C0    >                        ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a
 370++D695                                      ClearCarryFlag
 370++D695 B7          >                        or a
 371++D696 C9                                   ret
 372++D697
 373++D697
 374++D697              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 375++D697              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 375++D697 3A 17 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 375++D69A A7          >                        and a
 375++D69B C8          >                        ret    z
 376++D69C                                     ; break
 377++D69C CD E4 D0                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 378++D69F CD 4F 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 379++D6A2 CD 9A D3                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 380++D6A5                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 381++D6A5 3A 1D C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 382++D6A8 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 383++D6AA              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 384++D6AA CD 11 D6                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 385++D6AD CD B3 D3                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 386++D6B0 CD A6 8F     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 387++D6B3 CD 2B D3                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 388++D6B6 21 00 C9     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 389++D6B9 22 D5 96                             ld      (varV),hl
 390++D6BC 3A 17 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 391++D6BF CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 392++D6C1 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 393++D6C3 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 394++D6C4 AF                                   xor     a
 395++D6C5 32 10 D6                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 396++D6C8 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 397++D6C9 C5                                   push    bc
 398++D6CA 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 399++D6CB E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 400++D6CD E5                                   push    hl
 401++D6CE 21 48 D6                             ld      hl,XX4Distance
 402++D6D1 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 403++D6D2 E1                                   pop     hl
 404++D6D3 DA 18 D8                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 405++D6D6              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 406++D6D6 CD 95 D5     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 407++D6D9 3A DE 97                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 408++D6DC 47                                   ld      b,a
 409++D6DD                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 409++D6DD FE 04       >                        cp      4
 409++D6DF DA 1A D7    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 410++D6E2 CD 75 D3     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 411++D6E5 C3 A9 D7                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 412++D6E8 3A 76 C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 413++D6EB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 414++D6ED 32 76 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 415++D6F0 3A 7C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 416++D6F3 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 417++D6F5 32 7C C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 418++D6F8 3A 79 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 419++D6FB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 420++D6FD 32 79 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 421++D700 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 422++D702                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 422++D702 3A 82 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 422++D705 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 422++D707 32 82 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 423++D70A                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 423++D70A 3A 84 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 423++D70D CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 423++D70F 32 84 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 424++D712                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 424++D712 3A 86 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 424++D715 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 424++D717 32 86 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 425++D71A              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 426++D71A              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 427++D71A CD 50 D3                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 428++D71D 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 429++D71E FA 3D D7                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 430++D721              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 430++D721 3A 82 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 430++D724 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 430++D726 32 82 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 431++D729                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 431++D729 3A 84 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 431++D72C CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 431++D72E 32 84 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 432++D731                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 432++D731 3A 86 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 432++D734 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 432++D736 32 86 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 433++D739 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 434++D73A F2 21 D7                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 435++D73D              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 436++D73D              ; Add normal to XX15
 437++D73D              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 438++D73D              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 439++D73D              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 440++D73D              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 441++D73D              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 441++D73D 3A 86 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 441++D740 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 442++D743                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 442++D743 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 442++D746 32 D9 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 443++D749                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 443++D749 3A 7C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 443++D74C 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 444++D74F 3A 7E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 445++D752 CD D9 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 446++D755 DA E8 D6                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 447++D758 32 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 448++D75B                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 448++D75B 3A D9 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 448++D75E 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 449++D761                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 449++D761 3A 82 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 449++D764 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 450++D767                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 450++D767 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 450++D76A 32 D9 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 451++D76D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 451++D76D 3A 76 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 451++D770 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 452++D773 3A 78 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 453++D776 CD D9 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 454++D779 DA E8 D6                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 455++D77C 32 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 456++D77F                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 456++D77F 3A D9 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 456++D782 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 457++D785                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 457++D785 3A 84 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 457++D788 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 458++D78B                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 458++D78B 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 458++D78E 32 D9 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 459++D791                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 459++D791 3A 79 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 459++D794 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 460++D797 3A 7B C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 461++D79A CD D9 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 462++D79D DA E8 D6                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 463++D7A0 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 464++D7A3                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 464++D7A3 3A D9 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 464++D7A6 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 465++D7A9              ; calculate dot product LL89
 466++D7A9              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 466++D7A9 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 466++D7AC 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 467++D7AF 3A 82 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 468++D7B2 CD 45 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 469++D7B5 32 F4 97                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 470++D7B8 3A 89 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 471++D7BB 21 83 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 472++D7BE AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 473++D7BF 32 D9 97                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 474++D7C2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 474++D7C2 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 474++D7C5 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 475++D7C8 3A 84 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 476++D7CB CD 45 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 477++D7CE 32 D7 97                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 478++D7D1                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 478++D7D1 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 478++D7D4 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 479++D7D7 3A 8B C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 480++D7DA 21 85 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 481++D7DD AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 482++D7DE CD D9 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 483++D7E1 32 F4 97                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 484++D7E4                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 484++D7E4 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 484++D7E7 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 485++D7EA 3A 86 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 486++D7ED CD 45 AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 487++D7F0 32 D7 97                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 488++D7F3                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 488++D7F3 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 488++D7F6 32 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 489++D7F9 3A 87 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 490++D7FC 21 8D C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 491++D7FF AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 492++D800 CD D9 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 493++D803 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 494++D805 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 495++D807 3A D9 97                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 496++D80A ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 497++D80D 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 498++D80F 3A 10 D6     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 499++D812 CD F8 D1                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 500++D815 C3 1E D8                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 501++D818 3A 10 D6     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 502++D81B CD EF D1                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 503++D81E 21 10 D6     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 504++D821 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 505++D822 C1                                   pop         bc
 506++D823 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 507++D824 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 508++D826 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 509++D828 22 D5 96                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 510++D82B 05                                   dec         b
 511++D82C C2 C8 D6                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 512++D82F C9                                   ret
 513++D830
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm

 886+ D830              ; Process edges

 888+ D830              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
 889+ D830 ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 890+ D830 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 891+ D830 ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 892+ D830 ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 893+ D830 ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 894+ D830 ~            NodeXPositive\1
 894+ D830 ~
 895+ D830 ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 896+ D830 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 897+ D830 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 898+ D830 ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 899+ D830 ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 900+ D830 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 901+ D830 ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 902+ D830 ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 903+ D830 ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
 904+ D830 ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 905+ D830 ~            NodeNegative\1
 905+ D830 ~
 906+ D830 ~            LL52\1
 906+ D830 ~                                                              ;
 907+ D830 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
 908+ D830 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
 909+ D830 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 910+ D830 ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 911+ D830 ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 912+ D830 ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
 912+ D830 ~
 913+ D830 ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 914+ D830 ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 915+ D830 ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 916+ D830 ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 917+ D830 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 918+ D830 ~            SetAndMop\1
 918+ D830 ~
 919+ D830 ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 920+ D830 ~            FinishedThisNode\1
 921+ D830                                  ENDM

 924+ D830
 925+ D830              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 926+ D830                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 926+ D830 3A 0E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
 926+ D833 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
 927+ D836 ED 4B 88 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 928+ D83A A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 929+ D83B FA 51 D8             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 930+ D83E              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 931+ D83E              NodeXPositiveX:
 932+ D83E 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 933+ D83F 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 934+ D841 2A 0C C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo

 941+ D851              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 942+ D851              NodeNegativeX:

 944+ D851 2A 0C C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord

 949+ D85F              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 950+ D85F              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 951+ D85F CD 88 AB             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 952+ D862 3A 84 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2

 960+ D86D

 966+ D87B              NodeXPositiveY:
 967+ D87B 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo

 977+ D88E              NodeNegativeY:

 984+ D89C              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
 985+ D89C              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 986+ D89C CD 88 AB             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 987+ D89F 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2

 995+ D8AA              TransposeZ:
 996+ D8AA              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
 997+ D8AA 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
 998+ D8AD                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
 998+ D8AD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 998+ D8AF C2 C3 D8    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ

1000+ D8B5 2A 12 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
1001+ D8B8 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
1002+ D8BA 7D                   ld          a,l
1003+ D8BB 32 F4 97             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;

1005+ D8BF 32 D6 97             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
1006+ D8C2 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
1007+ D8C3              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1008+ D8C3              NegativeNodeZ:
1009+ D8C3              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1010+ D8C3 2A 12 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1011+ D8C6 ED 4B 8C C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
1012+ D8CA 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
1013+ D8CC                      ClearCarryFlag
1013+ D8CC B7          >                        or a
1014+ D8CD ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1015+ D8CF 7D                   ld          a,l
1016+ D8D0 32 F4 97             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1017+ D8D3 7C                   ld          a,h
1018+ D8D4 32 D6 97             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1019+ D8D7 E2 E4 D8             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1020+ D8DA              LL56Overflow:
1021+ D8DA FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1022+ D8DC 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1023+ D8DE 3A F4 97             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1024+ D8E1                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1024+ D8E1 FE 04       >                        cp    4
1024+ D8E3 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1025+ D8E4              MakeNodeClose:
1026+ D8E4              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1027+ D8E4 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1028+ D8E5 32 D6 97             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1029+ D8E8 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1030+ D8EA 32 F4 97             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1031+ D8ED C9                   ret

1033+ D8EE              ProcessVisibleNode:
1034+ D8EE              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;

1041+ D8F4              NodeAdditionsDone:
1042+ D8F4              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1043+ D8F4              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1044+ D8F4 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1045+ D8F7 21 83 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1046+ D8FA B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1047+ D8FB 21 86 C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1048+ D8FE B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1049+ D8FF              AreXYZHiAllZero:
