1051+ D901              DivideXYZBy2:
1052+ D901                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1052+ D901 2A 82 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1052+ D904 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1052+ D906 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1052+ D908 22 82 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1053+ D90B                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1053+ D90B 2A 85 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1053+ D90E CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1053+ D910 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1053+ D912 22 85 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1054+ D915 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1055+ D918 67                   ld          h,a
1056+ D919 3A F4 97             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1057+ D91C 6F                   ld          l,a
1058+ D91D                      ShiftHLRight1
1058+ D91D CB 3C       >			   srl h
1058+ D91F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1059+ D921 7C                   ld          a,h
1060+ D922 32 D6 97             ld          (varU),a
1061+ D925 7D                   ld          a,l
1062+ D926 32 F4 97             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1063+ D929 C3 F4 D8             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1064+ D92C              NodeScalingDone:
1065+ D92C              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1066+ D92C              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1067+ D92C                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1067+ D92C 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1067+ D92F 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1068+ D932 3A 82 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1069+ D935 21 D7 97             ld          hl,varQ
1070+ D938 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1071+ D939                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1071+ D939 DA 42 D9    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1072+ D93C CD E0 AF             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1073+ D93F C3 4A D9             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1074+ D942              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1075+ D942              LL69:
1076+ D942              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1077+ D942              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1078+ D942              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1079+ D942 47                   ld      b,a
1080+ D943 CD D1 A9             call    DIV16UNDOC
1081+ D946 79                   ld      a,c
1082+ D947 32 D8 97             ld      (varR),a
1083+ D94A               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1084+ D94A              SkipSmallAngle:
1085+ D94A              ScaleX:
1086+ D94A              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1087+ D94A 3A 84 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1088+ D94D                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1088+ D94D CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1088+ D94F C2 62 D9    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1089+ D952              ; ......................................................
1090+ D952              PositiveXPoint:
1091+ D952 3A D8 97             ld          a,(varR)
1092+ D955 6F                   ld          l,a
1093+ D956 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)
1094+ D959 67                   ld          h,a
1095+ D95A 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1096+ D95C ED 31                add         hl,a
1097+ D95E EB                   ex          de,hl
1098+ D95F C3 72 D9             jp          StoreXPoint
1099+ D962              NegativeXPoint:
1100+ D962              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1101+ D962 3A D8 97             ld          a,(varR)
1102+ D965 6F                   ld          l,a
1103+ D966 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)
1104+ D969 67                   ld          h,a
1105+ D96A 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1106+ D96C 06 00                ld          b,0
1107+ D96E                      ClearCarryFlag
1107+ D96E B7          >                        or a
1108+ D96F ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1109+ D971 EB                   ex          de,hl
1110+ D972              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1111+ D972 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1112+ D975 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1113+ D978 FD 23                inc         iy
1114+ D97A FD 23                inc         iy
1115+ D97C              ; ......................................................
1116+ D97C              LL66:
1117+ D97C              ProcessYPoint:
1118+ D97C AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1119+ D97D 32 D6 97             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1120+ D980                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1120+ D980 3A F4 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1120+ D983 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1121+ D986 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1122+ D989 21 D7 97             ld          hl,varQ
1123+ D98C BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1124+ D98D                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1124+ D98D DA 96 D9    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1125+ D990              SmallYPoint:
1126+ D990 CD E0 AF             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1127+ D993 C3 99 D9             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1128+ D996              SmallYHop:
1129+ D996              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1130+ D996 CD BD AF             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1131+ D999              SkipYScale:
1132+ D999              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1133+ D999 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1134+ D99C CB 7F                bit         7,a
1135+ D99E C2 B1 D9             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1136+ D9A1              PositiveYPoint:
1137+ D9A1 3A D8 97             ld          a,(varR)
1138+ D9A4 6F                   ld          l,a
1139+ D9A5 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)
1140+ D9A8 67                   ld          h,a
1141+ D9A9 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1142+ D9AB ED 31                add         hl,a
1143+ D9AD EB                   ex          de,hl
1144+ D9AE C3 C1 D9             jp          LL50
1145+ D9B1              NegativeYPoint:
1146+ D9B1              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1147+ D9B1 3A D8 97             ld          a,(varR)
1148+ D9B4 6F                   ld          l,a
1149+ D9B5 3A D6 97             ld          a,(varU)
1150+ D9B8 67                   ld          h,a
1151+ D9B9 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1152+ D9BB 06 00                ld          b,0
1153+ D9BD                      ClearCarryFlag
1153+ D9BD B7          >                        or a
1154+ D9BE ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1155+ D9C0 EB                   ex          de,hl
1156+ D9C1              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1157+ D9C1 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1158+ D9C4 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1159+ D9C7 FD 23                inc         iy
1160+ D9C9 FD 23                inc         iy
1161+ D9CB C9                   ret
1162+ D9CC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1163+ D9CC              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1164+ D9CC              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1165+ D9CC              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1166+ D9CC              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1167+ D9CC              CopyNodeToXX15:
1168+ D9CC                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1168+ D9CC 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1168+ D9CD 32 82 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1169+ D9D0 23                   inc         hl
1170+ D9D1                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1170+ D9D1 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1170+ D9D2 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1171+ D9D5 23                   inc         hl
1172+ D9D6                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1172+ D9D6 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1172+ D9D7 32 86 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1173+ D9DA 23                   inc         hl
1174+ D9DB              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1175+ D9DB              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1176+ D9DB 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1177+ D9DC 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1178+ D9DD 47                   ld          b,a
1179+ D9DE E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1180+ D9E0 32 83 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1181+ D9E3 78                   ld          a,b
1182+ D9E4 E6 40                and         $40
1183+ D9E6 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1184+ D9E8 32 85 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1185+ D9EB 78                   ld          a,b
1186+ D9EC E6 20                and         $20
1187+ D9EE CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1188+ D9F0 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1189+ D9F2 32 87 C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1190+ D9F5 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1191+ D9F6 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1192+ D9F8 32 F4 97             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1193+ D9FB C9                   ret
1194+ D9FC
1195+ D9FC              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1196+ D9FC              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1197+ D9FC              ;..............................................................................................................................
1198+ D9FC              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1199+ D9FC              LL48GetScale:
1200+ D9FC 3A C5 96             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1201+ D9FF 5F                   ld          e,a
1202+ DA00 CD CC D9             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1203+ DA03              LL48GetVertices:
1204+ DA03              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1205+ DA03                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1205+ DA03 BB          >                        cp      e
1205+ DA04 DA 45 DA    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1206+ DA07              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1207+ DA07                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1207+ DA07 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1207+ DA08 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1207+ DA09 32 D0 96    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1208+ DA0C 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1209+ DA0D E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1210+ DA0F E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1211+ DA10                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1211+ DA10 21 AF C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1211+ DA13 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1211+ DA15 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1212+ DA16 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1213+ DA17                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1213+ DA17 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1213+ DA19 C2 4B DA    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1214+ DA1C              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1215+ DA1C 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1216+ DA1D ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1217+ DA1F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1218+ DA21                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1218+ DA21 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1218+ DA23 C2 4B DA    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1219+ DA26              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1220+ DA26                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1220+ DA26 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1220+ DA27 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1220+ DA28 32 D0 96    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1221+ DA2B 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1222+ DA2C E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1223+ DA2E E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1224+ DA2F                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1224+ DA2F 21 AF C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1224+ DA32 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1224+ DA34 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1225+ DA35 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1226+ DA36                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1226+ DA36 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1226+ DA38 C2 4B DA    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1227+ DA3B              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1228+ DA3B 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1229+ DA3C ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1230+ DA3E E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1231+ DA40                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1231+ DA40 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1231+ DA42 C2 4B DA    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1232+ DA45              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1233+ DA45 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1234+ DA48 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1235+ DA4A                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1236+ DA4A C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1237+ DA4B              NodeIsVisible:
1238+ DA4B              LL49:
1239+ DA4B CD EE D8             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1240+ DA4E C9                   ret
1241+ DA4F
1242+ DA4F
1243+ DA4F              ProjectNodeToEye:
1244+ DA4F ED 4B 86 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1245+ DA53 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1246+ DA54 32 D7 97     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1247+ DA57 3A 82 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1248+ DA5A CD BA A9     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1249+ DA5D 3A 83 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1250+ DA60                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1250+ DA60 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1250+ DA62 C2 6D DA    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1251+ DA65              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1252+ DA65 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1253+ DA67 26 00            ld          h,0
1254+ DA69 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1255+ DA6A C3 74 DA         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1256+ DA6D              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1257+ DA6D 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1258+ DA6F 26 00            ld          h,0
1259+ DA71                  ClearCarryFlag
1259+ DA71 B7          >                        or a
1260+ DA72 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1261+ DA74              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1262+ DA74 EB               ex          de,hl
1263+ DA75 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1264+ DA78 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1265+ DA7B              EyeProcessYPoint:
1266+ DA7B ED 4B 86 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1267+ DA7F 79           	ld			a,c
1268+ DA80 32 D7 97     	ld			(varQ),a
1269+ DA83 3A 84 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1270+ DA86 CD BA A9     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1271+ DA89 3A 85 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1272+ DA8C                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1272+ DA8C CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1272+ DA8E C2 99 DA    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1273+ DA91              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1274+ DA91 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1275+ DA93                  ClearCarryFlag
1275+ DA93 B7          >                        or a
1276+ DA94 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1277+ DA96 C3 9E DA         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1278+ DA99              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1279+ DA99 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1280+ DA9B 26 00            ld          h,0
1281+ DA9D 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1282+ DA9E              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1283+ DA9E EB               ex          de,hl
1284+ DA9F FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1285+ DAA2 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1286+ DAA5 C9               ret
1287+ DAA6
1288+ DAA6
1289+ DAA6
1290+ DAA6              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1291+ DAA6              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1292+ DAA6              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1293+ DAA6              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1294+ DAA6              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1295+ DAA6              ; which can be simplified as:
1296+ DAA6              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1297+ DAA6              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1298+ DAA6              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1299+ DAA6              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1300+ DAA6              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1301+ DAA6              ;      Roll calculations:
1302+ DAA6              ;
1303+ DAA6              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1304+ DAA6              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1305+ DAA6              ;      Pitch calculations:
1306+ DAA6              ;
1307+ DAA6              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1308+ DAA6              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1309+ DAA6
1310+ DAA6
1311+ DAA6              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1312+ DAA6                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++DAA6
   2++DAA6              ; Full version
   3++DAA6              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++DAA6              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++DAA6              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++DAA6              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++DAA6
   8++DAA6
   9++DAA6              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++DAA6             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++DAA6 3A ED 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++DAA9 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++DAAC             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++DAAC 2A 36 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++DAAF 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++DAB2             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++DAB2 3A 34 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++DAB5 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++DAB8 3A 35 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++DABB EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++DABD CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++DAC0 ED 53 36 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++DAC4             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++DAC4 2A 34 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++DAC7 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++DACA 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++DACD CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++DAD0 ED 53 34 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++DAD4 C9                                   ret
  11++DAD5              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++DAD5             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++DAD5 3A ED 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++DAD8 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++DADB             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++DADB 2A 2A C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++DADE 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++DAE1             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++DAE1 3A 28 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++DAE4 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++DAE7 3A 29 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++DAEA EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++DAEC CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++DAEF ED 53 2A C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++DAF3             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++DAF3 2A 28 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++DAF6 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++DAF9 3A 2B C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++DAFC CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++DAFF ED 53 28 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++DB03 C9                                   ret
  13++DB04              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++DB04             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  13++DB04 3A ED 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  13++DB07 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++DB0A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++DB0A 2A 30 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  13++DB0D 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++DB10             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  13++DB10 3A 2E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++DB13 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  13++DB16 3A 2F C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  13++DB19 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  13++DB1B CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  13++DB1E ED 53 30 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  13++DB22             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++DB22 2A 2E C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++DB25 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++DB28 3A 31 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++DB2B CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++DB2E ED 53 2E C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++DB32 C9                                   ret
  15++DB33
  16++DB33              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  16++DB33             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  16++DB33 3A DC 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  16++DB36 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  16++DB39             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  16++DB39 2A 36 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  16++DB3C 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++DB3F             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  16++DB3F 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++DB42 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  16++DB45 3A 39 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  16++DB48 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  16++DB4A CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  16++DB4D ED 53 36 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  16++DB51             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  16++DB51 2A 38 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++DB54 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++DB57 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  16++DB5A CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  16++DB5D ED 53 38 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  17++DB61 C9                                   ret
  18++DB62              ApplyMyPitchToSidev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  18++DB62             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  18++DB62 3A DC 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  18++DB65 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  18++DB68             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  18++DB68 2A 2A C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  18++DB6B 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++DB6E             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  18++DB6E 3A 2C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++DB71 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  18++DB74 3A 2D C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  18++DB77 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  18++DB79 CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  18++DB7C ED 53 2A C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  18++DB80             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  18++DB80 2A 2C C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++DB83 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++DB86 3A 2B C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  18++DB89 CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  18++DB8C ED 53 2C C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  19++DB90 C9                                   ret
  20++DB91              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  20++DB91             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  20++DB91 3A DC 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  20++DB94 32 D7 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  20++DB97             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  20++DB97 2A 30 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  20++DB9A 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++DB9D             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  20++DB9D 3A 32 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++DBA0 32 D0 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  20++DBA3 3A 33 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  20++DBA6 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  20++DBA8 CD AF A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  20++DBAB ED 53 30 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  20++DBAF             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++DBAF 2A 32 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++DBB2 22 D8 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++DBB5 3A 31 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  20++DBB8 CD AF A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  20++DBBB ED 53 32 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  21++DBBF C9                                   ret
  22++DBC0
  23++DBC0
  24++DBC0              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++DBC0 ~                                    push    bc
  26++DBC0 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++DBC0 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++DBC0 ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++DBC0 ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++DBC0 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++DBC0 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++DBC0 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++DBC0 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++DBC0 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++DBC0 ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++DBC0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++DBC0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++DBC0 ~                                    pop     bc
  39++DBC0 ~                                    ret
  40++DBC0 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++DBC0 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++DBC0 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++DBC0 ~                                    or      a
  44++DBC0 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++DBC0 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++DBC0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++DBC0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++DBC0 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++DBC0 ~                                    pop     bc
  50++DBC0 ~                                    ret
  51++DBC0 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++DBC0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++DBC0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++DBC0 ~                                    pop     bc
  55++DBC0 ~                                    ret
  56++DBC0                                      ENDM
  57++DBC0
  58++DBC0
  59++DBC0              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++DBC0 C5          >                        push    bc
  59++DBC1 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++DBC2 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++DBC5 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++DBC6 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++DBC7 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++DBC8 FA D9 DB    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++DBCB             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++DBCB ED 5B D1 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++DBCF 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DBD2 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++DBD3 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++DBD6 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++DBD7 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DBD8 C9          >                        ret
  59++DBD9             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++DBD9 ED 5B D1 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++DBDD 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DBE0 B7          >                        or      a
  59++DBE1 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++DBE3 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++DBE5 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++DBE6 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++DBE9 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++DBEB C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DBEC C9          >                        ret
  59++DBED             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++DBED AF          >                    xor a
  59++DBEE 95          >                    sub l
  59++DBEF 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++DBF0 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++DBF1 94          >                    sub h
  59++DBF2 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++DBF3 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++DBF6 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++DBF7 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DBF8 C9          >                        ret
  60++DBF9
  61++DBF9              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++DBF9 C5          >                        push    bc
  61++DBFA 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++DBFB 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++DBFE 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++DBFF 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++DC00 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++DC01 FA 12 DC    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++DC04             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++DC04 ED 5B D1 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++DC08 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DC0B 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++DC0C 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++DC0F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++DC10 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DC11 C9          >                        ret
  61++DC12             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++DC12 ED 5B D1 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++DC16 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DC19 B7          >                        or      a
  61++DC1A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++DC1C 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++DC1E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++DC1F 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++DC22 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++DC24 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DC25 C9          >                        ret
  61++DC26             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++DC26 AF          >                    xor a
  61++DC27 95          >                    sub l
  61++DC28 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++DC29 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++DC2A 94          >                    sub h
  61++DC2B 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++DC2C 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++DC2F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++DC30 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DC31 C9          >                        ret
  62++DC32
  63++DC32              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++DC32 C5          >                        push    bc
  63++DC33 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++DC34 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++DC37 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++DC38 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++DC39 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++DC3A FA 4B DC    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++DC3D             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++DC3D ED 5B D1 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++DC41 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DC44 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++DC45 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++DC48 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++DC49 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DC4A C9          >                        ret
  63++DC4B             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++DC4B ED 5B D1 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++DC4F 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DC52 B7          >                        or      a
  63++DC53 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++DC55 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++DC57 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++DC58 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++DC5B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++DC5D C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DC5E C9          >                        ret
  63++DC5F             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++DC5F AF          >                    xor a
  63++DC60 95          >                    sub l
  63++DC61 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++DC62 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++DC63 94          >                    sub h
  63++DC64 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++DC65 22 D1 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++DC68 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++DC69 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DC6A C9          >                        ret
  64++DC6B
  65++DC6B              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++DC6B 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++DC6E              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++DC6E              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++DC6E              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++DC6E
  71++DC6E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++DC6E              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++DC6E 3A EE 96     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++DC71 21 DE 96                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++DC74 B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++DC75 CA 2F DD                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++DC78                                      ;break
  78++DC78              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++DC78 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++DC79 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++DC7C CD 0B A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++DC7F 32 D2 96                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++DC82 22 D0 96                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++DC85              ; A = Flip sign
  85++DC85 3A F0 96                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++DC88 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++DC8B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++DC8C              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++DC8C CD F9 DB                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++DC8F              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++DC8F 32 6D DC                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++DC92 22 6B DC                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++DC95              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++DC95 3A DE 96                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++DC98 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++DC99 CD 0B A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++DC9C 32 D2 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++DC9F 22 D0 96                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++DCA2              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++DCA2 3A 6D DC                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++DCA5 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++DCA6 3A DF 96                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++DCA9 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++DCAA              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++DCAA CD 32 DC                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++DCAD 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++DCB0 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++DCB3              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++DCB3 3A DE 96                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++DCB6 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++DCB7 CD 0B A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++DCBA 32 D2 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++DCBD 22 D0 96                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++DCC0              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++DCC0 3A 6D DC                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++DCC3 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++DCC6 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++DCC7 3A DF 96                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++DCCA AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++DCCB 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++DCCC 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++DCCF AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++DCD0 F2 DF DC                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++DCD3 2A D1 96                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++DCD6 ED 5B 6B DC                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++DCDA B7                                   or      a
 127++DCDB 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++DCDC C3 F9 DC                             jp      .MV44
 129++DCDF 2A 6B DC     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++DCE2 ED 5B D1 96                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++DCE6 B7                                   or      a
 132++DCE7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++DCE9 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++DCEB                                      NegHL
 134++DCEB AF          >                    xor a
 134++DCEC 95          >                    sub l
 134++DCED 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++DCEE 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++DCEF 94          >                    sub h
 134++DCF0 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++DCF1 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++DCF4 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++DCF6 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++DCF9              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++DCF9 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++DCFC 3A EE 96                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++DCFF 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++DD00 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++DD03 CD 0B A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++DD06 32 D2 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++DD09 22 D0 96                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++DD0C 3A EF 96                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++DD0F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++DD10 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++DD13 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++DD14 CD C0 DB                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++DD17 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++DD1A 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++DD1D                                      ;break
 154++DD1D                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++DD1D
 156++DD1D CD A6 DA                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++DD20 CD D5 DA                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++DD23 CD 04 DB                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++DD26 CD 33 DB                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++DD29 CD 62 DB                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++DD2C CD 91 DB                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++DD2F 3A D3 97     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++DD32 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++DD34 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++DD35 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++DD38 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++DD3B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++DD3C 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++DD3E CD BB AD                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++DD41 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++DD44 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++DD47 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1313+ DD48                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++DD48              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD48              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++DD48 3A 22 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++DD4B 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++DD4C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++DD4E 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++DD4F 32 3B C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++DD52 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++DD53 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++DD55 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++DD57 FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++DD59 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++DD5B 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++DD5C 32 3C C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++DD5F 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++DD60 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++DD61 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++DD64 21 2E C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++DD67 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++DD6A 21 34 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++DD6D 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++DD70 CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++DD73 21 30 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++DD76 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++DD79 21 36 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++DD7C 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++DD7F CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++DD82 21 32 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++DD85 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++DD88 21 38 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++DD8B 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++DD8E CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++DD91 3A 21 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++DD94 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++DD95 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++DD97 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++DD98 32 3B C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++DD9B 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++DD9C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++DD9E C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++DD9F FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++DDA1 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++DDA3 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++DDA4 32 3C C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++DDA7 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++DDA8 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++DDA9 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++DDAC 21 2E C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++DDAF 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++DDB2 21 28 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++DDB5 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++DDB8 CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++DDBB 21 30 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++DDBE 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  55++DDC1 21 2A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  56++DDC4 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  57++DDC7 CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  58++DDCA 21 32 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  59++DDCD 22 B9 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  60++DDD0 21 2C C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  61++DDD3 22 BB 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  62++DDD6 CD A2 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  63++DDD9 C9                                   ret
  64++DDDA
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm

1329+ DE23 CD 1B D1                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15

1337+ DE31              ; for each node:
1338+ DE31              ;     see if node >

1340+ DE32 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER

1342+ DE36 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0

1344+ DE38 32 FF C2                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1345+ DE3B CD E4 D0                             call CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1346+ DE3E CD 4F 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1347+ DE41 CD 9A D3                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18

1352+ DE4E 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1353+ DE4F 16 06                                ld      d,6
1354+ DE51 CD EA A9                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1355+ DE54 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices

1359+ DE5A E5                                   push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1360+ DE5B FD E5                                push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1361+ DE5D 78                                   ld      a,b

1364+ DE61 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)

1366+ DE67 CD 1B D1                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1367+ DE6A CD 98 D1                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1368+ DE6D FD E1                                pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1369+ DE6F CD 4F DA                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1370+ DE72                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1371+ DE72                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1372+ DE72 FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1373+ DE74 E1                                   pop		hl
1374+ DE75 3E 04                                ld		a,4
1375+ DE77 ED 31                                add		hl,a
1376+ DE79 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1377+ DE7A FD E1                                pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1378+ DE7C E1                                   pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list

1380+ DE7F ED 31                                add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1381+ DE81 C1                                   pop		bc                                  ; get counter back

   1++DF1E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DF1E              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DF1E 21 CD C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DF21 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node

   3++DF30                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
