   1++DF30              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DF30              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DF30 21 CD C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DF33 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DF35 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DF36 11 86 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DF39 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DF3B ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DF3D ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DF3F ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DF41 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   4++DF42                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DF42              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DF42              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DF42 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DF42 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DF42 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DF42                                  ENDM
   7++DF42
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DF42              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DF42              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DF42               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DF42 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DF43
  10++DF43              PrepLines:
  11++DF43              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DF43
  13++DF43              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DF43              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DF43              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DF43              ;        or          8
  17++DF43              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DF43              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DF43              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DF43              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DF43              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DF43              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DF43              ;
  24++DF43              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DF43              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DF43                      ;break
  27++DF43                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DF43 AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DF44 32 FF C2    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DF47                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DF47 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DF48 32 00 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DF4B                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DF4B AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DF4C 32 42 DF    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DF4F 3A 14 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DF52 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DF54 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DF57 21 0D C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DF5A 22 DA 97             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DF5D                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DF5D 3A 14 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DF60 32 DE 97    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DF63 3A 23 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DF66                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DF66 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DF68 CA 70 DF    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DF6B E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DF6D 32 23 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DF70              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DF70              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DF70              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DF70              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DF70              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DF70 21 50 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DF73                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DF73 22 D5 96             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DF76 3A 10 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DF79 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DF7A              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DF7A              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DF7A 2A D5 96             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DF7D E5                   push        hl
  54++DF7E FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DF80                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DF80 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DF80                      ENDIF
  58++DF80 3A C5 96             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DF83 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DF84              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DF84 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DF87                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DF87 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DF88 DA DB DF    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DF8B              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DF8B              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DF8B              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DF8B FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DF8E 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DF8F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DF91                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DF91 21 AF C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DF94 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DF96 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DF97              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DF97                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DF97 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  71++DF99 C2 AD DF    >                        jp	nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DF9C              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DF9C 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DF9D ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DF9F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DFA1 E5                   push        hl
  77++DFA2                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DFA2 21 AF C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DFA5 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DFA7 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DFA8 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DFA9                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DFA9 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DFAA CA DB DF    >                        jp	z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DFAD              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DFAD              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DFAD              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DFAD FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DFB0 CD 1E DF             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DFB3 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DFB6 CD 30 DF             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DFB9 CD 8E CE             call        ClipLine
  88++DFBC 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DFBE              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DFBE ED 5B DA 97          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DFC2 21 82 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DFC5                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DFC5 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DFC7 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DFC9 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DFCB ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DFCD ED 53 DA 97          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DFD1 21 FF C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DFD4 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DFD5 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DFD6                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DFD6 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DFD8 D2 F1 DF    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DFDB              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DFDB              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DFDB              LL78:
 101++DFDB 2A D5 96             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DFDE 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DFE0 ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DFE2 22 D5 96             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DFE5 21 42 DF             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DFE8 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DFE9 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DFEA                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DFEA 21 DE 97    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DFED BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DFEE C2 7A DF    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DFF1              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DFF1              LL81:
 111++DFF1              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DFF1 3A FF C2             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DFF4 CB 27                sla         a
 114++DFF6 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DFF8 32 00 C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DFFB              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DFFB C9                   ret
 118++DFFC
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

 382+ F675              ShipEquipTableRowLen    EQU 16
 383+ F675              ShipEquipTableSize      EQU ($-ShipEquipmentList)/ShipEquipTableRowLen
 384+ F675
 385+ F675              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 386+ F675 2B           GalaxyRandSeed			DB	43	            ; Just some start values
 387+ F676 20           GalaxyRandSeed1			DB	32	            ; Just some start values
 388+ F677 0C           GalaxyRandSeed2			DB	12	            ; Just some start values
 389+ F678 42           GalaxyRandSeed3			DB	66	            ; Just some start values
 390+ F679              GalaxySeedRandom:
 391+ F679              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 392+ F679 CD 8F 9C     GetDigramGalaxySeed:    call	copy_galaxy_to_working
 393+ F67C 18 03                                jr		GetDigramWorkingSeed
 394+ F67E CD A7 9C     GetDigramSystemSeed:    call	copy_system_to_working
 395+ F681 11 A5 A4     GetDigramWorkingSeed:   ld		de,name_expanded    ; ">GetDigram a = digram seed"
 396+ F684 06 03                                ld		b,3
 397+ F686 3A B8 98                             ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)
 398+ F689 E6 40                                and		$40
 399+ F68B 28 03                                jr		z,.SmallSizeName
 400+ F68D CD C6 A4     .LargeSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 401+ F690 CD C6 A4     .SmallSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 402+ F693 CD C6 A4                             call	NamingLoop
 403+ F696 CD C6 A4                             call	NamingLoop
 404+ F699 EB           .DoneName:              ex		de,hl
 405+ F69A 36 00                                ld		(hl),0
 406+ F69C EB                                   ex		de,hl
 407+ F69D C9                                   ret
 408+ F69E
 409+ F69E 11 75 F6     GalaxySetSeedFromHL:    ld      de,GalaxyRandSeed
 410+ F6A1              ; Uses registers a,b and hl
 411+ F6A1 B7           GalaxyDoRandom:         or      a                                               ; in 6502 this is called after a bcc instruction to will always be clear (see .detok2 and .dt6)
 412+ F6A2 3A 75 F6                             ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed)
 413+ F6A5 CB 17        .Seed0Rolled:           rl      a                                               ; r0 << 1
 414+ F6A7 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = reg x in 6502 so x = r0 << 1
 415+ F6A8 21 77 F6     .AddSeed2               ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed2                              ;
 416+ F6AB 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; a = r0 << 1 + r2
 417+ F6AC 32 75 F6     .SetRandSeed0:          ld		(GalaxyRandSeed),a					            ; set r0' = (r0 << 1) +  r2 + (r0 bit 7)
 418+ F6AF 78                                   ld      a,b
 419+ F6B0 32 77 F6     .SetRandSeed2:          ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; set r2' =  r0 << 1
 420+ F6B3 3A 76 F6     .GetRandSeed1:          ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed1)
 421+ F6B6 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = r1
 422+ F6B7 21 78 F6                             ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed3
 423+ F6BA 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; Adc from before may have set carry flag or may not, will be set if r0 << 1 + r2 + carry > 256
 424+ F6BB 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; set r1' = r1 + r3 + carry
 425+ F6BE 4F                                   ld      c,a
 426+ F6BF 78                                   ld      a,b
 427+ F6C0 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; set r3 = r1
 428+ F6C3 79                                   ld      a,c
 429+ F6C4 C9                                   ret
 430+ F6C5
 431+ F6C5              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 432+ F6C5 ED 31        galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de:add     hl,a
 433+ F6C7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 434+ F6C9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch low byte
 435+ F6CA 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ F6CB 23                                   inc     hl
 437+ F6CC 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch high byte
 438+ F6CD 68                                   ld      l,b
 439+ F6CE 67                                   ld      h,a
 440+ F6CF 7E           GalaxyCopyLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 441+ F6D0 FE 00                                cp      0
 442+ F6D2 C8                                   ret     z
 443+ F6D3 12                                   ld      (de),a
 444+ F6D4 23                                   inc     hl
 445+ F6D5 13                                   inc     de
 446+ F6D6 18 F7                                jr      GalaxyCopyLoop
 447+ F6D8              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 448+ F6D8 11 63 F1     galaxy_get_species:     ld      de,GalaxySpecies
 449+ F6DB 3E 28                                ld      a,"("
 450+ F6DD 12                                   ld      (de),a
 451+ F6DE 13                                   inc     de
 452+ F6DF 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+4)
 453+ F6E2 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 454+ F6E4 20 0A                                jr      nz,.NonHuman
 455+ F6E6 21 61 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantHumanIx
 456+ F6E9 AF                                   xor     a
 457+ F6EA CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 458+ F6ED C3 4B F7                             jp      .galaxy_species_exit
 459+ F6F0 3A FC E8     .NonHuman:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 460+ F6F3 CB 3F                                srl     a
 461+ F6F5 CB 3F                                srl     a
 462+ F6F7 E6 07                                and     $07
 463+ F6F9 FE 03                                cp      3
 464+ F6FB 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc1
 465+ F6FD 21 33 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc1Ix
 466+ F700 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 467+ F703 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 468+ F705 12                                   ld      (de),a
 469+ F706 13                                   inc     de
 470+ F707 3A FC E8     .NotDesc1:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 471+ F70A CB 3F                                srl     a
 472+ F70C CB 3F                                srl     a
 473+ F70E CB 3F                                srl     a
 474+ F710 CB 3F                                srl     a
 475+ F712 CB 3F                                srl     a
 476+ F714 FE 06                                cp      6
 477+ F716 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc2
 478+ F718 21 39 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc2Ix
 479+ F71B CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 480+ F71E 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 481+ F720 12                                   ld      (de),a
 482+ F721 13                                   inc     de
 483+ F722 3A F8 E8     .NotDesc2:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 484+ F725 47                                   ld      b,a
 485+ F726 3A FA E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 486+ F729 A8                                   xor     b
 487+ F72A E6 07                                and     $07
 488+ F72C F5                                   push    af
 489+ F72D FE 06                                cp      6
 490+ F72F 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc3
 491+ F731 21 45 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc3Ix
 492+ F734 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 493+ F737 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 494+ F739 12                                   ld      (de),a
 495+ F73A 13                                   inc     de
 496+ F73B F1           .NotDesc3:              pop     af
 497+ F73C 47                                   ld      b,a
 498+ F73D 3A FC E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 499+ F740 E6 03                                and     $03
 500+ F742 80                                   add     a,b
 501+ F743 E6 07                                and     $07
 502+ F745 21 51 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc4Ix
 503+ F748 CD C5 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 504+ F74B 3E 73        .galaxy_species_exit:   ld      a,"s"
 505+ F74D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 506+ F74E 13                                   inc     de
 507+ F74F 3E 29                                ld      a,")"
 508+ F751 12                                   ld      (de),a
 509+ F752 13                                   inc     de
 510+ F753 AF                                   xor     a
 511+ F754 12                                   ld      (de),a
 512+ F755 C9                                   ret
 513+ F756
 514+ F756
 515+ F756              ; To copy seed, loops from 3 to 0
 516+ F756              ; copy seed X + 2 to target X
 517+ F756              ; x = x -1
 518+ F756
 519+ F756              ; For lave we shoudl have "Lave is most famous for its vast rain forests and the Lavian tree grub"
 520+ F756
 521+ F756              GalaxyCapitaliseString: ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 522+ F756 23                                   inc		hl
 523+ F757 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 524+ F758 FE 00                                cp		0
 525+ F75A C8                                   ret		z
 526+ F75B FE 5B                                cp		'Z'+1
 527+ F75D 30 F7                                jr		nc,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 528+ F75F FE 41                                cp		'A'
 529+ F761 38 F3                                jr		c,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 530+ F763 C6 20        .LowerCase:             add		a,'a'-'A'
 531+ F765 77                                   ld		(hl),a
 532+ F766 18 EE                                jr		GalaxyCapitaliseString
 533+ F768
 534+ F768
 535+ F768              GalaxyGoatSoup:         ;ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable
 536+ F768                                      ;call    galaxy_system_under_cursor                      ; and set the galaxyworkingseed based on cursor
 537+ F768                                      ;cp      $FF
 538+ F768                                      ;jr      z,.NoSystemFound
 539+ F768 3A BA 98     .SeedGalaxy             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)                              ;
 540+ F76B 32 75 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed),a                              ; r0 = Seed C
 541+ F76E 3A BB 98                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)                              ;
 542+ F771 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; r1 = Seeed D
 543+ F774 3A BC 98                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)                              ;
 544+ F777 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; r2 = Seed E
 545+ F77A 3A BD 98                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)                              ;
 546+ F77D 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; r3 = Seed F
 547+ F780 C9                                   ret
 548+ F781              ; For later......
 549+ F781 3E 05        .MarkExtendedDesc:      ld      a,5                                             ;  ("{lower case}{justify}{single cap}[86-90] IS [140-144].{cr}{left align}"
 550+ F783 F5           .GalaxyExpandDesc:      push    af
 551+ F784 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = 6502 X reg
 552+ F785 C5                                   push    bc                                              ; save Y reg
 553+ F786
 554+ F786              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 555+ F786              ; We enter here with BC = the Y and X Coordinates of the system to select in this galaxy
 556+ F786              ; This is based on the docked BBC PDesc Pink Volcanoes version ratehr tha goat soup
 557+ F786 ED 43 5B E8  GalaxyPinkVolcano:      ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable
 558+ F78A CD 55 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor                      ; and set the galaxyworkingseed based on cursor
 559+ F78D                                      ;cp      $FF
 560+ F78D                                      ;jr      z,.NoSystemFound
